cards.name: Deadeye Tormentor
cards.text: Raid — When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: Despite their noble heritage, the pirates of the Deadeye Fleet are known for underhanded tactics and despicable trickery.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Fahlaugen-Peiniger

foreignNames.name: Atormentador de la Perfidia

foreignNames.name: Persécuteur morne-œil

foreignNames.name: 데드아이 고문자
foreignNames.text: 습격 — 데드아이 고문자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 카드 한 장을 버린다.

foreignNames.name: Atormentador da Olho Morto

foreignNames.name: Палач Зоркой Флотилии

foreignNames.name: 必达舰队拷问人

cards.originalText: Raid — When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Deadeye Tracker
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: You can’t activate Deadeye Tracker’s ability without targeting two cards in a single opponent’s graveyard.
If one target card is an illegal target by the time Deadeye Tracker’s ability resolves, the remaining legal target is exiled and Deadeye Tracker explores.
If each target card is an illegal target by the time Deadeye Tracker’s ability resolves, the entire ability doesn’t resolve. Deadeye Tracker won’t explore.

Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Fahlaugen-Fährtensucher
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Schicke zwei Karten deiner Wahl aus dem Friedhof eines Gegners ins Exil. Der Fahlaugen-Fährtensucher erkundet. (Decke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf. Falls die Karte ein Land ist, nimm sie auf deine Hand. Lege sonst eine +1/+1-Marke auf diese Kreatur und lege dann die Karte zurück oder auf deinen Friedhof.)

Pon esa carta en tu mano si es una tierra. De lo contrario, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre esta criatura y luego devuelve la carta a su sitio o ponla en tu cementerio.)

foreignNames.name: 데드아이 추적자

foreignNames.name: Rastreador da Olho Morto

cards.name: Deathless Ancient
cards.text:
Flying
Tap three untapped Vampires you control: Return Deathless Ancient from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Ancient one, we have reached the promised shore. The Immortal Sun is near. Drink and awake."

rulings.text: Deathless Ancient’s last ability can be activated only while it’s in your graveyard.

Once you announce that you’re activating Deathless Ancient’s last ability, no player may take other actions until the ability’s been paid for. Notably, players can’t try to stop the ability by tapping or removing Vampires you control.

To activate the last ability, you may tap any untapped Vampires you control, including ones you haven’t controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn. (Note that tapping the creature doesn’t use {T} [the tap symbol].)

foreignNames.flavor: Среди пиратов Бравого Союза опаснее неудачи может быть лишь громкий успех.

foreignNames.name: 焦炬舰队匿宝客
foreignNames.text: 当焦炬舰队匿宝客死去时，派出一个无色珍宝衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 对于莽霸联盟的海盗而言，只有成功比失败更难熬。

foreignNames.name: 焦炬艦隊匿寶客
foreignNames.text: 當焦炬艦隊匿寶客死去時，派出一個無色珍寶衍生神器，且具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 對於莽霸聯盟的海盜而言，只有成功比失敗更難熬。

cards.originalText: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Dire Fleet Interloper
cards.text:
Menace
When Dire Fleet Interloper enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Schreckensflotten-Infiltratorin
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich
Wenn die Schreckensflotten-Infiltratorin ins Spiel kommt, erkundet sie. (Decke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf. Falls die Karte ein Land ist, nimm sie auf deine Hand. Lege sonst eine +1/+1-Marke auf diese Kreatur und lege dann die Karte zurück oder auf deinen Friedhof.)

foreignNames.name: Intrusa de la Flota Arrasadora
foreignNames.text:
Amenaza.
Cuando la Intrusa de la Flota Arrasadora entre al campo de batalla, explora. (Muestra la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Pon esa carta en tu mano si es una tierra. De lo contrario, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre esta criatura y luego devuelve la carta a su sitio o ponla en tu cementerio.)

foreignNames.name: Importune de la Flotte implacable
foreignNames.text:
Menace
Quand l'Importune de la Flotte implacable arrive sur le champ de bataille, elle explore. (Révélez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez cette carte dans votre main si c'est un terrain. Sinon, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur cette créature, puis remettez la carte au-dessus de votre bibliothèque ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)

foreignNames.name: Intrusa della Flotta Funesta
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare
Quando l'Intrusa della Flotta Funesta entra nel campo di battaglia, esplora. (Rivela la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Se è una terra, aggiungila alla tua mano. Altrimenti, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su questa creatura, poi rimetti quella carta al suo posto o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)

foreignNames.name: 凶兆艦隊の侵入者
foreignNames.text:
威迫
凶兆艦隊の侵入者が戦場に出たとき、これは探検を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを公開する。それが土地であるなら、そのカードをあなたの手札に加える。そうでないなら、このクリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置き、その後、そのカードを戻すかあなたの墓地に置く。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊

foreignNames.name: 다이어 선단 침입자
foreignNames.text:
호전적
다이어 선단 침입자가 전장에 들어올 때, 다이어 선단 침입자는 탐험을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 공개한다. 그 카드가 대지라면 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그렇지 않으면, 이 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓은 후, 그 카드를 서고에 다시 올려놓거나 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.)

foreignNames.name: Intrusa da Frota Macabra
foreignNames.text:
Ameaçar
Quando Intrusa da Frota Macabra entra no campo de batalha, ela explora. (Revele o card do topo de seu grimório. Coloque aquele card em sua mão se ele for um terreno. Caso contrário, coloque um marcador +1/+1 nesta criatura e, em seguida, devolva o card ao grimório ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)

foreignNames.name: Контрабандистка Лютой Флотилии
foreignNames.text:
Угроза
Когда Контрабандистка Лютой Флотилии выходит на поле битвы, она использует Разведку. (Покажите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Если та карта является землей, положите ее в вашу руку. В противном случае положите на это существо один жетон +1/+1, затем положите ту карту назад или положите ее на ваше кладбище.)

foreignNames.name: 焦炬舰队径闯客
foreignNames.text:
威慑
当焦炬舰队径闯客进战场时，令它勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

foreignNames.name: 焦炬艦隊徑闖客
foreignNames.text:
威懾
當焦炬艦隊徑闖客進戰場時，令它勘察。（展示你的牌庫頂牌。如果該牌是地，則置於你手上。若否，則在此生物上放置一個+1/+1指示物，然後將所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的墳墓場。）

cards.originalText:
Menace
When Dire Fleet Interloper enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Dire Fleet Ravager
cards.text:
Menace, deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of their life, rounded up.
cards.flavor: His fists fume with the decay of death, each strike a plague on the hearts of his enemies.

rulings.text: For example, if you have 13 life, you'll lose 5 life.
If a player has 1 life, that player loses 1 life. If each player has 0 life after that, the game's a draw.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, each player loses a third of the team's life total rounded up. For example, if a team has 13 life, each player on that team loses 5 life and the team loses 10 life total.

foreignNames.name: Schreckensflotten-Verwüster
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich, Todesberührung
Wenn der Schreckensflotten-Verwüster ins Spiel kommt, verliert jeder Spieler ein Drittel seiner Lebenspunkte, aufgerundet.
foreignNames.flavor: Aus seinen Fäusten qualmt der Rauch des Todes und jeder Schlag erfüllt seine Feinde mit Fäulnis.

foreignNames.name: Devastador de la Flota Arrasadora
foreignNames.text:
Amenaza, toque mortal.
Cuando el Devastador de la Flota Arrasadora entre al campo de batalla, cada jugador pierde un tercio de sus vidas, redondeando hacia arriba.
foreignNames.flavor: Sus puños humean con la putrefacción de la muerte, y cada golpe abre una llaga incurable en el corazón de sus enemigos.

foreignNames.name: Dévastateur de la Flotte implacable
foreignNames.text:
Menace, contact mortel
Quand le Dévastateur de la Flotte implacable arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque joueur perd un tiers de ses points de vie, arrondi à l'unité supérieure.
foreignNames.type: Créature : orque et pirate et sorcier
foreignNames.flavor: Ses poings crachant des volutes de putréfaction s'abattent tels un fléau sur le cœur de ses ennemis.

foreignNames.name: Devastatore della Flotta Funesta
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare, tocco letale
Quando il Devastatore della Flotta Funesta entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni giocatore perde un terzo dei propri punti vita, arrotondati per eccesso.

foreignNames.name: 凶兆艦隊の荒廃者

威迫、接死

foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — オーク・海賊・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 彼の拳からは腐敗の煙が立ち上る。敵の心臓は一撃で侵される。

foreignNames.name: 다이어 선단 유린자

foreignNames.flavor: 그의 주먹은 부패하는 죽음의 독기를 뿜으며, 휘두를 때마다 적의 심장에 역병을 일으킨다.

foreignNames.name: Опустошитель Лютой Флотилии

Угроза, Смертельное касание

foreignNames.flavor: Его кулаки испускают гибельный дым, и каждый удар моровым поветрием заражает сердца врагов.

foreignNames.name: 焦炬舰队劫夺客

foreignNames.type: 生物 ～半兽人／海盗／法术师
foreignNames.flavor: 他双手喷出死亡腐息，每一拳都让敌人病入骨髓。

foreignNames.name: 焦炬艦隊劫奪客
foreignNames.text:
威懾，死觸

foreignNames.type: 生物 ～半獸人／海盜／魔法師

When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Solitude and starvation are brutal punishments, but even worse is all that time to think.

foreignNames.name: Zwang
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Karte, die weder eine Kreatur noch ein Land ist. Der Spieler wirft die bestimmte Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Wenn du einsam verhungerst, hast du wenigstens Zeit, ungestört über alles nachzudenken, was dich in diese Lage gebracht hat.

foreignNames.name: Coacción
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra ni criatura. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.
foreignNames.flavor: La soledad y el hambre son dos castigos terribles, pero aún peor es tener tanto tiempo para pensar.

foreignNames.name: Contrainte
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-créature non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.
foreignNames.flavor: La faim et la solitude sont de cruels châtiments, mais le temps passé à ruminer sur son sort est bien pire.

foreignNames.name: Costrizione
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra, non creatura da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.
foreignNames.flavor: La solitudine e la fame sono punizioni crudeli, ma la parte peggiore è avere tutto il tempo del mondo per pensare.

foreignNames.name: 強迫
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中からクリーチャーでも土地でもないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 孤独と空腹がひどい苦痛を与えるが、なお悪いのは考える時間があることだ。

foreignNames.name: 구속
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그 중 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 고독과 굶주림은 잔인한 형벌이지만, 더욱 끔찍한 것은 그 시간 내내 생각을 해야 한다는 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Coagir
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno nem uma criatura da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card.
foreignNames.flavor: A solidão e a inanição são punições brutais, mas ainda pior é todo aquele tempo para pensar.

foreignNames.name: Насилие
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся ни существом, ни землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Одиночество и голод — жестокое наказание, но хуже всего — время на размышления.

foreignNames.name: 逼从
foreignNames.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 禁闭与禁食等惩罚虽然都很残忍，但更残忍的是这整段的反省时光。

foreignNames.name: 逼從
foreignNames.text: 目標對手展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張非生物且非地的牌。該玩家棄掉該牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 禁閉與禁食等懲罰雖然都很殘忍，但更殘忍的是這整段的反省時光。

cards.originalText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Fathom Fleet Captain
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, if you control another nontoken Pirate, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace.
cards.flavor: "Join me, and take the world for yourself!"

rulings.text: While resolving Fathom Fleet Captain’s triggered ability, you can’t pay {2} multiple times to create more than one Pirate token.

If you don’t control another nontoken Pirate at the moment Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, its triggered ability won’t trigger. If you don’t control another nontoken Pirate as that ability resolves, you can’t pay {2}.

foreignNames.name: Kapitän der Tiefseeflotte
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich
Immer wenn der Kapitän der Tiefseeflotte angreift und falls du einen anderen Nichtspielstein-Piraten kontrollierst, kannst du {2} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen 2/2 schwarzen Pirat-Kreaturenspielstein mit Bedrohlichkeit.
foreignNames.flavor: „Schließt euch mir an und die Welt wird euch gehören!"

foreignNames.name: Capitán de la Flota Abisal
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.flavor: "¡Únete a mí y conquista el mundo tú mismo!".

foreignNames.name: Capitaine de la Flotte des grands fonds
foreignNames.text:
Menace
À chaque fois que le Capitaine de la Flotte des grands fonds attaque, si vous contrôlez un autre pirate non-jeton, vous pouvez payer {2}. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Pirate avec la menace.
foreignNames.flavor: « Suivez-moi, et prenez le monde pour vous-mêmes ! »

foreignNames.name: Capitano della Flotta Abissale
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare
Ogniqualvolta il Capitano della Flotta Abissale attacca, se controlli un altro Pirata non pedina, puoi pagare {2}. Se lo fai, crea una pedina creatura Pirata 2/2 nera con minacciare.
foreignNames.flavor: "Unitevi a me e impadronitevi del mondo!"

foreignNames.name: 深海艦隊の船長
foreignNames.text:
威迫
深海艦隊の船長が攻撃するたび、あなたがトークンでない他の海賊をコントロールしている場合、あなたは{2}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、威迫を持つ黒の２/２の海賊・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「俺の仲間になれ。世界を手にするんだ！」

foreignNames.name: 패덤 선단 선장
foreignNames.text:
호전적
패덤 선단 선장이 공격할 때마다, 당신이 토큰이 아닌 다른 해적을 조종한다면, 당신은 {2}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 호전적을 가진 2/2 흑색 해적 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: "나와 함께 세상을 차지하자!"

foreignNames.name: Capitão da Frota Abissal

Ameaçar
Toda vez que Capitão da Frota Abissal ataca, se você controla outro Pirata que não seja uma ficha, você pode pagar {2}. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Pirata com ameaçar.
foreignNames.flavor: "Junte-se a mim e conquiste o mundo para si mesmo!"

foreignNames.name: Капитан Флотилии Бездны

foreignNames.flavor: «Присоединяйтесь ко мне и станьте хозяевами этого мира!»

威慑
每当莫测舰队船长攻击时，若你操控另一个非衍生物的海盗，则你可以支付{2}。如果你如此作，则派出一个2/2黑色，具威慑异能的海盗衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「跟我一起，亲自征服世界！」

foreignNames.name: 莫測艦隊船長
foreignNames.text:
威懾
每當莫測艦隊船長攻擊時，若你操控另一個非衍生物的海盜，則你可以支付{2}。如果你如此作，則派出一個2/2黑色，具威懾異能的海盜衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「跟我一起，親自征服世界！」

Menace

cards.name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
cards.text: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
cards.flavor: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."

foreignNames.name: Tiefseeflotten-Meuchlerin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Tiefseeflotten-Meuchlerin ins Spiel kommt, zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert und der in diesem Zug bereits Schaden zugefügt wurde.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ein schlechter Tag für dich. Ein guter Tag für die Haifische."

foreignNames.name: Asesina de la Flota Abisal
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Asesina de la Flota Abisal entre al campo de batalla, destruye la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente y que haya recibido daño este turno.

foreignNames.name: Surineuse de la Flotte des grands fonds
foreignNames.text: Quand la Surineuse de la Flotte des grands fonds arrive sur le champ de bataille, détruisez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle qui a subi des blessures ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ce n'était pas ta soirée, matelot. Maintenant, tu es au menu des requins. »

foreignNames.name: Tagliagole della Flotta Abissale
foreignNames.text: Quando la Tagliagole della Flotta Abissale entra nel campo di battaglia, distruggi una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario a cui è stato inflitto danno in questo turno.

foreignNames.flavor: 「今夜のあんたは運が悪かったね。サメはエサに有り付けてラッキーだけど。」

foreignNames.name: 패덤 선단 살인귀
foreignNames.text: 패덤 선단 살인귀가 전장에 들어올 때, 이번 턴에 피해를 입은 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "오늘 저녁엔 운이 나쁘군, 친구. 이제 상어 밥이 될 시간이네."

foreignNames.name: Degoladora da Frota Abissal
foreignNames.text: Quando Degoladora da Frota Abissal entrar no campo de batalha, destrua a criatura alvo que um oponente controla que sofreu dano neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Foi uma noite ruim para você, colega. Agora é hora do lanchinho dos tubarões."

foreignNames.name: Злодейка Флотилии Бездны
foreignNames.text: Когда Злодейка Флотилии Бездны выходит на поле битвы, уничтожьте находящееся под контролем оппонента целевое существо, которому в этом ходу были нанесены повреждения.
foreignNames.flavor: «У тебя выдался скверный вечерок, приятель. А теперь акулам пора ужинать».

foreignNames.name: 莫测舰队割喉客
foreignNames.text: 当莫测舰队割喉客进战场时，消灭目标由对手操控的生物，且须为于本回合受过伤害者。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你今晚真不走运，伙计。现在到了鲨鱼开饭的时间。」

foreignNames.name: 莫測艦隊割喉客
foreignNames.text: 當莫測艦隊割喉客進戰場時，消滅目標由對手操控的生物，且須為於本回合受過傷害者。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你今晚真不走運，伙計。現在到了鯊魚開飯的時間。」

cards.originalText: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

cards.name: Grim Captain's Call
cards.text: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.
cards.flavor: When the battle is over, the bitterest foes at last find common ground.

rulings.text: Grim Captain’s Call doesn’t target the cards to return. You choose them while it’s resolving. No players may take actions between the time you make each choice and the time you return each card to your hand.

If a card in your graveyard has more than one of these types (such as a Dinosaur that’s a Vampire Dinosaur due to Arcane Adaptation’s effect), you may choose to return it for one of its types and return another card of the other type.
If you don’t have a card in your graveyard of one of the listed creature types, you just continue to the next listed type.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Ruf der Grausamen Kapitänin
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Pirat-Karte aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Mache dann dasselbe mit je einer Vampir-, Dinosaurier- und Meervolk-Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Wenn der Kampf vorüber ist, teilen sich auch die schlimmsten Feinde eine letzte Ruhestätte.

foreignNames.name: Llamada de la capitana siniestra
foreignNames.text: Regresa una carta de Pirata de tu cementerio a tu mano. Luego, haz lo mismo con un Vampiro, un Dinosaurio y un Tritón.
foreignNames.flavor: Cuando la batalla termina, los enemigos más encarnizados a veces terminan compartiendo tu punto de vista.

foreignNames.name: Appel du capitaine sinistre
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez dans votre main une carte de pirate depuis votre cimetière, puis faites de même avec un vampire, un dinosaure et un ondin.
foreignNames.flavor: À la fin du combat, les ennemis les plus acharnés se trouvent enfin un point commun.

foreignNames.name: Chiamata della Capitana Lugubre
foreignNames.text: Riprendi in mano una carta Pirata dal tuo cimitero, poi fai lo stesso con un Vampiro, un Dinosauro e un Tritone.
foreignNames.flavor: Una volta terminata la battaglia, anche i nemici più irriducibili trovano infine un terreno comune.

foreignNames.name: 不気味な船長の召集
foreignNames.text: あなたの墓地から海賊・カード１枚をあなたの手札に戻す。その後、吸血鬼と恐竜とマーフォークについて同様のことを行う。
foreignNames.flavor: 戦闘が終わって初めて、最も手ごわかった敵に共通点が生まれる。

foreignNames.name: 음산한 선장의 부름
foreignNames.text: 해적 카드 한 장을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린 후, 흡혈귀와 공룡, 인어에 대해서도 똑같이 한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 전투가 끝나면, 서로 증오하던 원수들이 마침내 같은 입장이 된다.

foreignNames.name: Chamado da Capitã Sinistra
foreignNames.text: Devolva um card de Pirata de seu cemitério para sua mão, e em seguida, faça o mesmo com um Vampiro, um Dinossauro e um Tritão.
foreignNames.flavor: Quando a batalha termina, os inimigos mais ferrenhos finalmente encontram algo em comum.

foreignNames.name: Воззвание Мрачного Капитана
foreignNames.text: Верните карту Пирата из вашего кладбища в вашу руку, затем сделайте то же самое для Вампира, Динозавра и Мерфолка.
foreignNames.flavor: Когда заканчивается бой, даже самые непримиримые враги вместе ложатся в одну землю.

foreignNames.name: 司命召令
foreignNames.text: 将一张海盗牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后对吸血鬼牌、恐龙牌和人鱼牌执行同样流程。
foreignNames.flavor: 战斗结束后，不共戴天的仇敌终有机会携手共眠。

foreignNames.name: 司命召令
foreignNames.text: 將一張海盜牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上，然後對吸血鬼牌、恐龍牌和人魚牌執行同樣流程。
foreignNames.flavor: 戰鬥結束後，不共戴天的仇敵終有機會攜手共眠。

cards.originalText: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.

cards.name: Heartless Pillage
cards.text:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid — If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

rulings.text: If you've attacked with a creature this turn, you'll get a Treasure even if the target opponent discards one or zero cards.
You create only one Treasure token if you attacked this turn, no matter how many creatures you attacked with beyond the first.

foreignNames.name: Herzlose Plünderung
foreignNames.text:
Ein Gegner deiner Wahl wirft zwei Karten ab.
Überfall — Falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast, erzeuge einen farblosen Schatz-Artefaktspielstein mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."

foreignNames.name: Saqueo sin compasión
foreignNames.text:
El oponente objetivo descarta dos cartas.
Incursión — Si atacaste con una criatura este turno, crea una ficha de artefacto Tesoro incolora con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".

foreignNames.name: Pillage cruel
foreignNames.text:
L'adversaire ciblé se défausse de deux cartes.
Saccage — Si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».

foreignNames.name: Razzia Spietata
foreignNames.text:
Un avversario bersaglio scarta due carte.
Incursione — Se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, crea una pedina artefatto Tesoro incolore con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".

foreignNames.name: 無情な略奪
foreignNames.text:
対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカード２枚を捨てる。
強襲 ― このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していたなら、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ生成する。

foreignNames.name: 비정한 강탈
foreignNames.text:
상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 카드 두 장을 버린다.
습격 — 이 턴에 당신이 생물로 공격했다면, "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignNames.name: Pilhagem Impiedosa
foreignNames.text:
O oponente alvo descarta dois cards.
Raide — Se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, crie uma ficha de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."

foreignNames.name: Бессердечный Грабеж
foreignNames.text:
Целевой оппонент сбрасывает две карты.
Набег — Если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, создайте одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».

foreignNames.name: 无情劫掠
foreignNames.text:
目标对手弃两张牌。
突击～如果你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则派出一个无色珍宝衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

foreignNames.name: 無情劫掠
foreignNames.text:
目標對手棄兩張牌。
突擊～若你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則派出一個無色珍寶衍生神器，且具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」

cards.originalText:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Kitesail Freebooter
cards.text:
Flying
When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: If Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield before its enters-the-battlefield ability resolves, the opponent will reveal their hand, but no card will be exiled.

foreignNames.name: Flugdrachen-Freibeuterin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Flugdrachen-Freibeuterin ins Spiel kommt, zeigt ein Gegner deiner Wahl die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst davon eine Karte, die weder eine Kreatur noch ein Land ist. Schicke die bestimmte Karte ins Exil, bis die Flugdrachen-Freibeuterin das Spiel verlässt.

foreignNames.name: Bandida velacometa
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando la Bandida velacometa entre al campo de batalla, el oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra ni criatura. Exilia esa carta hasta que la Bandida velacometa deje el campo de batalla.

foreignNames.name: Flibustière à voile volante
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand la Flibustière à voile volante arrive sur le champ de bataille, l'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-créature non-terrain. Exilez cette carte jusqu'à ce que la Flibustière à voile volante quitte le champ de bataille.

foreignNames.name: Filibustiera del Velaliante
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando la Filibustiera del Velaliante entra nel campo di battaglia, un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra, non creatura da quella mano. Esilia quella carta finché la Filibustiera del Velaliante non lascia il campo di battaglia.

foreignNames.name: 帆凧の掠め盗り
foreignNames.text:
飛行
帆凧の掠め盗りが戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中からクリーチャーでも土地でもないカード１枚を選ぶ。帆凧の掠め盗りが戦場を離れるまでそのカードを追放する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊

foreignNames.name: 연글라이더 탈취자
foreignNames.text:
비행
연글라이더 탈취자가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그 중 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 연글라이더 탈취자가 전장을 떠날 때까지 그 카드를 추방한다.

foreignNames.name: Pirata de Aeroveleiro
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Pirata de Aeroveleiro entra no campo de batalha, o oponente alvo revela sua própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno nem uma criatura da mão dele. Exile aquele card até Pirata de Aeroveleiro deixar o campo de batalha.

foreignNames.name: Воздушный Флибустьер
foreignNames.text:
Полет
 Когда Воздушный Флибустьер выходит на поле битвы, целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся ни существом, ни землей. Изгоните ту карту до тех пор, пока Воздушный Флибустьер не покинет поле битвы.

foreignNames.name: 航筝掠盗
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当航筝掠盗进战场时，目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。放逐该牌，直到航筝掠盗离开战场为止。

foreignNames.name: 航箏掠盜
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當航箏掠盜進戰場時，目標對手展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張非生物且非地的牌。放逐該牌，直到航箏掠盜離開戰場為止。

cards.originalText:
Flying
When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Lurking Chupacabra
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control explores, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Shadow birthed it. The moon gave it eyes, and the jungle gave it teeth. But it was Death that taught it cruelty."
—Huatli

rulings.text: You don’t choose a target for Lurking Chupacabra’s ability until after your creature has finished exploring.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. Effects that trigger when a creature you control explores, such as that of Lurking Chupacabra, trigger if appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Lauernder Chupacabra
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, erkundet, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Nacht gab ihm Gestalt, doch der Tod lehrte ihn Grausamkeit." —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Chupacabras acechante
foreignNames.text: Siempre que una criatura que controlas explore, la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente obtiene -2/-2 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nació de las sombras. La luna le dio ojos, y la jungla, dientes. Pero fue la muerte la que le enseñó la crueldad". —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Chupacabra en maraude
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature que vous contrôlez explore, une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle gagne -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il fut enfanté par les ténèbres. La lune lui donna des yeux, et la jungle des crocs. Mais ce fut la Mort qui lui enseigna la cruauté. » —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Chupacabra in Agguato
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura che controlli esplora, una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario prende -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "L'ombra lo generò. La luna gli donò gli occhi, la giungla i denti. Ma fu la Morte a insegnargli la crudeltà." —Huatli

foreignNames.name: 隠れ潜むチュパカブラ
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーが１体探検を行うたび、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－２/－２の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ビースト・ホラー
foreignNames.flavor: 「影から生まれた。月が目を、ジャングルが歯を与えた。そして死が、あれに残酷さを教えたのさ。」 ――ファートリ

foreignNames.name: 잠복한 추파카브라
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물이 탐험을 할 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -2/-2를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "어둠이 그것에게 생명을 주었고, 달은 눈을, 밀림은 이빨을 주었다. 하지만 잔혹성을 가르친 것은 죽음이었다." —화틀리

foreignNames.name: Chupacabra Emboscador
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que uma criatura que você controla explora, a criatura alvo que um oponente controla recebe -2/-2 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "A sombra o pariu. A lua lhe deu olhos; a selva, dentes. Mas foi a Morte que lhe ensinou a crueldade." — Huatli

foreignNames.name: Рыскающая Чупакабра
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда существо под вашим контролем использует Разведку, целевое существо под контролем оппонента получает -2/-2 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Тени породили ее. Луна подарила ей глаза, а джунгли — острые зубы. Но жестокости научила ее сама Смерть». — Уатли

foreignNames.name: 伏击卓柏卡布拉
foreignNames.text: 每当一个由你操控的生物勘察时，目标由对手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「暗影诞其生命，明月赐其双眼，丛林磨其利齿，死亡教其残忍。」 ～华特莉

foreignNames.name: 伏擊卓柏卡布拉
foreignNames.text: 每當一個由你操控的生物勘察時，目標由對手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「暗影誕其生命，明月賜其雙眼，叢林磨其利齒，死亡教其殘忍。」 ～華特莉

cards.originalText: Whenever a creature you control explores, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.name: March of the Drowned
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return two target Pirate cards from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Marsch der Ertrunkenen
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
• Bringe zwei Pirat-Karten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Marcha de los ahogados
foreignNames.text:
Elige uno:
• Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
• Regresa dos cartas objetivo de Pirata de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignNames.name: Marche des noyés
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Renvoyez une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
• Renvoyez deux cartes de pirate ciblées depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Marcia degli Annegati
foreignNames.text:
Scegli uno —
• Riprendi in mano una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
• Riprendi in mano due carte Pirata bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 溺死者の行進
foreignNames.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
• あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
• あなたの墓地から海賊・カード２枚を対象とし、それらをあなたの手札に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 수장된 자들의 행진
foreignNames.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
• 당신의 무덤에 있는 해적 카드 두 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Marcha dos Afogados
foreignNames.text:
Escolha um —
• Devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
• Devolva dois cards de Pirata alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Марш Утопленников
foreignNames.text:
Выберите одно —
• Верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
• Верните две целевые карты Пиратов из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: 溺魂行伍
foreignNames.text:
选择一项～
•将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
•将两张目标海盗牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 溺魂行伍
foreignNames.text:
選擇一項～

cards.name: Queen's Agent
cards.text:
Lifelink
When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

Sinon, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur cette créature, puis remettez la carte au-dessus de votre bibliothèque ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)

cards.name: Raiders' Wake
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: One was spared to tell the gruesome tale.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

Some raid abilities trigger at the beginning of your end step. These abilities trigger if you attacked with a creature that turn, even if the card with that raid ability wasn’t on the battlefield when you attacked.

cards.name: Revel in Riches
cards.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

rulings.text: If you don’t control ten Treasures as your upkeep begins, the second ability of Revel in Riches won’t trigger. You can’t take any actions during your turn before your upkeep begins.
If you don’t control ten Treasures as the second ability of Revel in Riches resolves, you won’t win the game.
If an opponent’s creature dies at the same time that Revel in Riches is destroyed, you’ll get a Treasure.
If the second ability of Revel in Riches causes you to win the game, please refrain from throwing your Treasure tokens into the air as this may distract or injure other players.

Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls du zehn oder mehr Schätze kontrollierst, gewinnst du die Partie.

cards.originalText:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

cards.name: Ruin Raider
cards.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's mana value.

rulings.text: If the revealed card doesn’t have a mana cost (because it’s a land card, for example), its converted mana cost is 0.
The converted mana cost of a split card, such as cards with aftermath from the Amonkhet block, is based on the combined mana cost of its two halves.
If the mana cost of the revealed card includes {X}, X is considered to be 0.

Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

Some raid abilities trigger at the beginning of your end step. These abilities trigger if you attacked with a creature that turn, even if the card with that raid ability wasn’t on the battlefield when you attacked.

cards.name: Seekers' Squire
cards.text: When Seekers' Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: Dusk follows the light.

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

cards.name: Sword-Point Diplomacy
cards.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put that card into your hand unless any opponent pays 3 life. Then exile the rest.
cards.flavor: "Take my blood if you want. Just don't take my gold!"

rulings.text: You reveal all three cards before opponents choose whether to pay life for any of them.

In a multiplayer game, each opponent in turn order chooses whether to pay life for one card before proceeding to the next card. You choose the order to perform this process for the cards, but opponents may discuss them before making any choices. Opponents will then know choices made by earlier opponents when making their choices.

These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

foreignNames.name: Vraskas Verachtung
foreignNames.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl ins Exil. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Schon bald kursierten im Hafen am Ende der Welt die wildesten Gerüchte über die neue Kapitänin, die jemanden mit nur einem Blick zu Stein erstarren lassen konnte.

foreignNames.name: Desprecio de Vraska
foreignNames.text: Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo. Ganas 2 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: No pasó mucho tiempo hasta que las tabernas de Zabordada se llenaron de rumores sobre la nueva capitana que podía convertir a alguien en piedra con una sola mirada.

foreignNames.name: Mépris de Vraska
foreignNames.text: Exilez la créature ciblée ou le planeswalker ciblé. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Les tavernes de La Rade se firent bientôt l'écho de la rumeur d'une nouvelle capitaine capable de transformer quelqu'un en pierre d'un simple regard.

foreignNames.name: Disprezzo di Vraska
foreignNames.text: Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio. Guadagni 2 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Ben presto, nelle taverne della Secca si cominciò a mormorare della nuova capitana in grado di trasformare la gente in pietra con un solo sguardo.

foreignNames.name: ヴラスカの侮辱
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 一睨みで人を石に変える新船長の話題が、孤高街のどの酒場でも囁かれるようになるまで、長くはかからなかった。

foreignNames.name: 브라스카의 경멸
foreignNames.text: 생물이나 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한다. 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 얼마 지나지 않아 하이 앤 드라이의 선술집들은 쳐다보는 것만으로 사람을 돌로 만든다는 신임 선장에 대한 소문으로 들끓었다.

foreignNames.name: Desprezo de Vraska
foreignNames.text: Exile a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Não levou muito tempo para que as tavernas de Banco de Areia se enchessem de murmúrios sobre a nova capitã capaz de transformar as pessoas em pedra com um olhar.

foreignNames.name: Презрение Враски
foreignNames.text: Изгоните целевое существо или planeswalker-а. Вы получаете 2 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: Прошло совсем немного времени, и в тавернах Города-на-Мели шепотом заговорили о новом капитане, способном одним взглядом обратить в камень.

foreignNames.name: 瓦丝卡的藐视
foreignNames.text: 放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。你获得2点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 绝涛城的酒馆里很快就传开了这样的流言：有位新船长只消一瞪眼就能将人变成石头。

foreignNames.name: 瓦絲卡的藐視
foreignNames.text: 放逐目標生物或鵬洛客。你獲得2點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 絕濤城的酒館裡很快就傳開了這樣的流言：有位新船長只消一瞪眼就能將人變成石頭。

cards.originalText: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

cards.name: Walk the Plank
cards.text: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.
cards.flavor: When Captain Thorn adds a new ship to his fleet, he gives the crew a simple choice: follow me, or fall in the sea.

foreignNames.name: Über die Planke gehen
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Nicht-Meervolk-Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: In Kapitän Dorns Flotte gilt auch für die Mannschaften neuer Schiffe: Folgt mir oder verlasst das Schiff über die Planke.

foreignNames.name: Caminar por la plancha
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo que no sea Tritón.
foreignNames.flavor: Cuando el capitán Espina añade un barco nuevo a su flota, ofrece a su tripulación la posibilidad de elegir: o lo apoyan o se van nadando.

foreignNames.name: Supplice de la planche
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature non-Ondin ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Quand le capitaine Espine ajoute un nouveau navire à sa flotte, il laisse un choix simple à l'équipage : lui ou les fonds marins.

foreignNames.name: In Pasto agli Squali
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura non Tritone bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Quando il Capitano Pugno di Spine aggiunge una nuova nave alla sua flotta, offre alla ciurma una scelta semplice: restare a bordo o scendere.

foreignNames.name: 板歩きの刑
foreignNames.text: マーフォークでないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 船長ブランディスが船を艦隊に加えるときには、その船の船員に簡単な選択肢を示す。従うか、海に落ちるか。

foreignNames.name: 판자 걷기
foreignNames.text: 인어가 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 쏜 선장은 선단에 배를 새로 추가할 때 그 배의 선원들에게 단순한 선택을 제시한다: 따르거나, 바다에 빠지거나.

foreignNames.name: Andar na Prancha
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo que não seja Tritão.
foreignNames.flavor: Quando o Capitão Espinho acrescenta um novo navio à sua frota, ele dá à tripulação uma escolha simples: venham comigo, ou vão com o mar.

foreignNames.name: Прогулка по Доске
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое не являющееся Мерфолком существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Когда капитан Шип захватывает новый корабль для своей флотилии, он предлагает команде простой выбор: последовать за ним или отправиться на дно.

foreignNames.name: 逼上跳板
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标非人鱼的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 竦恩船长新将一艘船纳入麾下后，便让该船上的船员作个简单的决定：听命或落海。

foreignNames.name: 逼上跳板
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標非人魚的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 竦恩船長新將一艘船納入麾下後，便讓該船上的船員作個簡單的決定：聽命或落海。

cards.originalText: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.

cards.name: Wanted Scoundrels
cards.text: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor: "Trust me. The reward's not worth it."

foreignNames.name: Gesuchte Schurken
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Gesuchten Schurken sterben, erzeugt ein Gegner deiner Wahl zwei farblose Schatz-Artefaktspielsteine mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
foreignNames.flavor: „Glaub mir. Das ist die Belohnung nicht wert."

foreignNames.name: Truhanes en busca y captura
foreignNames.text: Cuando los Truhanes en busca y captura mueran, el oponente objetivo crea dos fichas de artefacto Tesoro incoloras con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: "Confía en mí. La recompensa no merece la pena".

foreignNames.name: Vauriens recherchés
foreignNames.text: Quand les Vauriens recherchés meurent, l'adversaire ciblé crée deux jetons d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».
foreignNames.flavor: « Croyez-moi. La récompense n'en vaut pas la peine. »

foreignNames.name: Canaglie Ricercate
foreignNames.text: Quando le Canaglie Ricercate muoiono, un avversario bersaglio crea due pedine artefatto Tesoro incolori con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: "Credimi. La taglia non vale la pena."

foreignNames.name: 指名手配の獄道者
foreignNames.text: 指名手配の獄道者が死亡したとき、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを２つ生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「やめておきな。あの懸賞金では割に合わないよ。」

foreignNames.name: 수배된 악당들
foreignNames.text: 수배된 악당들이 죽을 때, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: "날 믿어. 그 현상금 가지곤 택도 없어."

foreignNames.name: Patifes Procurados
foreignNames.text: Quando Patifes Procurados morre, o oponente alvo cria duas fichas de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: "Confie em mim. A recompensa não vale."

foreignNames.name: Разыскиваемые Головорезы
foreignNames.text: Когда Разыскиваемые Головорезы умирают, целевой оппонент создает две фишки бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: «Поверь мне. Награда того не стоит».

foreignNames.name: 遭缉无赖
foreignNames.text: 当遭缉无赖死去时，目标对手派出两个无色珍宝衍生神器，它们具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 「相信我。报酬不值得你这么干。」

foreignNames.name: 遭緝無賴
foreignNames.text: 當遭緝無賴死去時，目標對手派出兩個無色珍寶衍生神器，它們具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 「相信我。報酬不值得你這麼幹。」

cards.originalText: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Angrath's Marauders
cards.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
cards.flavor: Captain Angrath cares less about treasure than mayhem. If he can't leave Ixalan, he'll burn the plane down.

rulings.text: If a creature with trample you control would deal combat damage to a blocking creature while you control Angrath’s Marauders, you must assign its unmodified damage. For example, a 3/3 creature with trample blocked by a 2/2 creature can have at most 1 damage assigned to the defending player. It will then deal 4 damage to the blocking creature and 2 damage to the defending player.
If an effect such as that of Chandra’s Pyrohelix asks you to divide damage among targets, you must divide the unmodified damage before doubling it.
If you control a second Angrath’s Marauders, damage dealt by sources you control will be multiplied by 4. If you control a third, it will be multiplied by 8, and so on.

foreignNames.name: Angraths Plünderer
foreignNames.text: Falls eine Quelle, die du kontrollierst, einer bleibenden Karte oder einem Spieler Schaden zufügen würde, fügt sie der bleibenden Karte oder dem Spieler stattdessen doppelt so viele Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Kapitän Angrath schert sich nicht um Reichtümer, er will nur zerstören. Wenn er Ixalan nicht verlassen kann, dann brennt er die Welt eben nieder.

foreignNames.name: Merodeadores de Angrath
foreignNames.text: Si una fuente que controlas fuera a hacer daño a un permanente o jugador, en vez de eso, hace el doble de ese daño a ese permanente o jugador.
foreignNames.flavor: Al capitán Angrath le gusta más el caos que los tesoros. Si no puede abandonar Ixalan, quemará el plano entero.

foreignNames.name: Maraudeurs d'Angrath
foreignNames.text: Si une source que vous contrôlez devait infliger des blessures à un permanent ou à un joueur, elle inflige à la place le double de ces blessures à ce permanent ou à ce joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: Le capitaine Angrath est plus intéressé par le chaos que par les trésors. S'il ne peut pas quitter Ixalan, il réduira le plan en cendres.

foreignNames.name: Predatori di Angrath
foreignNames.text: Se una fonte che controlli sta per infliggere danno a un permanente o a un giocatore, infligge invece il doppio di quel danno a quel permanente o a quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: Il Capitano Angrath brama più la distruzione che i tesori. Se non riuscirà a lasciare Ixalan, ridurrà il piano in cenere.

foreignNames.name: アングラスの匪賊
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしている発生源がパーマネントかプレイヤーにダメージを与えるなら、代わりに、それはそのパーマネントかプレイヤーにその点数の２倍のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 船長アングラスは宝物よりも騒乱に関心がある。イクサランを離れられずにいると、次元全体を焼き尽くしてしまうだろう。

foreignNames.name: 앙그라스의 약탈자들
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 원천이 지속물이나 플레이어에게 피해를 입히려 한다면, 대신에 그 원천은 그 피해를 두 배로 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 앙그라스 선장은 보물보다 파괴를 더 좋아한다. 그가 익살란을 떠나지 않으면 차원 전체가 불탈 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Vândalos de Angrath
foreignNames.text: Se uma fonte que você controla for causar dano a uma permanente ou a um jogador, em vez disso, ela causará o dobro daquele dano àquela permanente ou àquele jogador.
foreignNames.flavor: O Capitão Angrath prefere o caos aos tesouros. Se não puder sair de Ixalan, ele queimará o plano inteiro.

foreignNames.name: Мародеры Анграта
foreignNames.text: Если источник под вашим контролем должен нанести повреждения перманенту или игроку, вместо этого он наносит те повреждения тому перманенту или игроку в двойном размере.
foreignNames.flavor: Хаос и разрушения капитан Анграт любит куда больше сокровищ. Если он не сумеет покинуть Иксалан, то спалит этот мир дотла.

foreignNames.name: 安戈斯的劫掠者
foreignNames.text: 如果某个由你操控的来源将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成两倍的伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 安戈斯船长无心敛财只求破坏。他若是无法离开依夏兰，便要让整座时空都陷入火海。

foreignNames.name: 安戈斯的劫掠者
foreignNames.text: 如果某個由你操控的來源將對任一永久物或玩家造成傷害，則改為它對該永久物或玩家造成兩倍的傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 安戈斯船長無心斂財只求破壞。他若是無法離開依夏蘭，便要讓整座時空都陷入火海。

cards.originalText: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

cards.name: Bonded Horncrest
cards.text: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.
cards.flavor:
"You don't tame a horncrest. You convince it that it's easier to destroy something else."
—Amautl, knight of Atzocan

rulings.text: If you control more than one Bonded Horncrest, they can attack or block together, even if no other creatures attack or block.

Although Bonded Horncrest can’t attack alone, other attacking creatures don’t have to attack the same player or planeswalker. For example, Bonded Horncrest could attack an opponent and another creature could attack a planeswalker that opponent controls. Similarly, other blocking creatures don’t have to block the same creature that Bonded Horncrest blocks.
Once Bonded Horncrest has attacked or blocked, it will remain in combat even if you no longer control another attacking or blocking creature.
If an effect says that Bonded Horncrest attacks or blocks if able and you control another creature able to attack or block, you must attack or block with Bonded Horncrest and that creature.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Bonded Horncrest can attack or block with a creature controlled by your teammate, even if no other creatures you control are attacking or blocking.

foreignNames.name: Gezäumtes Kammhorn
foreignNames.text: Das Gezäumte Kammhorn kann weder alleine angreifen noch alleine blocken.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ein Kammhorn kann man nicht zähmen. Man kann es nur überzeugen, besser etwas anderes zu zerstören." —Amautl, Ritter von Atzocan

foreignNames.name: Crestacuerno amansado
foreignNames.text: El Crestacuerno amansado no puede atacar ni bloquear solo.
foreignNames.flavor: "No se puede domar a un crestacuerno. Solo convencerlo de que es más fácil destrozar otra cosa". —Amautl, caballero de Atzocan

foreignNames.name: Crêtecorne conjoint
foreignNames.text: Le Crêtecorne conjoint ne peut pas attaquer ou bloquer seul.
foreignNames.flavor: « On ne dompte pas un crêtecorne. On le convainc qu'il lui sera plus facile de détruire autre chose. » —Amautl, chevalier d'Atzocan

foreignNames.name: Cresticorno Sellato
foreignNames.text: Il Cresticorno Sellato non può attaccare o bloccare da solo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non puoi domare un cresticorno. Puoi solo convincerlo che è più facile distruggere qualcos'altro." —Amautl, cavaliere di Yatzocal

foreignNames.name: 結束した角冠
foreignNames.text: 結束した角冠は単独では攻撃したりブロックしたりできない。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「角冠は馴らすものじゃない。誰か他の奴らを蹴散らす方が簡単だって思わせるのさ。」 ――アゾカンの騎士、アマートゥル

foreignNames.name: 유대를 맺은 뿔볏
foreignNames.text: 유대를 맺은 뿔볏은 혼자서 공격하거나 방어할 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: "뿔볏은 길들이는 게 아니야. 다른 걸 파괴하는 게 더 쉽다고 설득하는 거지." —앗초칸의 기사 아마우틀

foreignNames.name: Cristocórneo Selado
foreignNames.text: Cristocórneo Selado não pode atacar nem bloquear sozinho.
foreignNames.flavor: "Não se doma um cristocórneo. Você o convence de que é mais fácil destruir outra coisa." — Amautl, cavaleiro de Atzocan

foreignNames.name: Объезженный Гребнерог
foreignNames.text: Объезженный Гребнерог не может атаковать или блокировать в одиночку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Гребнерога нельзя укротить. Можно убедить его, что проще разнести что-то другое». — Амаутль, рыцарь Ацокана

foreignNames.name: 坐骑角羽龙
foreignNames.text: 坐骑角羽龙不能单独进行攻击或阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你不用专门去驯服角羽龙。你只需要让它相信破坏其他东西比较容易就好。」 ～阿佐坎骑士阿茂托

foreignNames.name: 坐騎角羽龍
foreignNames.text: 坐騎角羽龍不能單獨進行攻擊或阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你不用專門去馴服角羽龍。你只需要讓牠相信破壞其他東西比較容易就好。」 ～阿佐坎騎士阿茂托

cards.originalText: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.

cards.name: Brazen Buccaneers
cards.text:
Haste
When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Tollkühne Seeräuber
foreignNames.text:
Eile
Wenn die Tollkühnen Seeräuber ins Spiel kommen, erkunden sie. (Decke die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf. Falls die Karte ein Land ist, nimm sie auf deine Hand. Lege sonst eine +1/+1-Marke auf diese Kreatur und lege dann die Karte zurück oder auf deinen Friedhof.)

foreignNames.name: Bucaneros de Azófar
foreignNames.text:
Prisa.
Cuando los Bucaneros de Azófar entren al campo de batalla, exploran. (Muestra la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Pon esa carta en tu mano si es una tierra. De lo contrario, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre esta criatura y luego devuelve la carta a su sitio o ponla en tu cementerio.)

foreignNames.name: Boucaniers intrépides
foreignNames.text:
Célérité
Quand les Boucaniers intrépides arrivent sur le champ de bataille, ils explorent. (Révélez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez cette carte dans votre main si c'est un terrain. Sinon, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur cette créature, puis remettez la carte au-dessus de votre bibliothèque ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)

foreignNames.name: Bucanieri di Bronzo
foreignNames.text:
Rapidità
Quando i Bucanieri di Bronzo entrano nel campo di battaglia, esplorano. (Rivela la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Se è una terra, aggiungila alla tua mano. Altrimenti, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su questa creatura, poi rimetti quella carta al suo posto o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)

foreignNames.name: 鉄面連合の海賊
foreignNames.text:
速攻
鉄面連合の海賊が戦場に出たとき、これは探検を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを公開する。それが土地であるなら、そのカードをあなたの手札に加える。そうでないなら、このクリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置き、その後、そのカードを戻すかあなたの墓地に置く。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊

foreignNames.name: 브레이즌 연합 해적
foreignNames.text:
신속
브레이즌 연합 해적이 전장에 들어올 때, 브레이즌 연합 해적은 탐험을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 공개한다. 그 카드가 대지라면 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그렇지 않으면, 이 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓은 후, 그 카드를 서고에 다시 올려놓거나 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.)

foreignNames.name: Bucaneiros Brônzeos
foreignNames.text:
Ímpeto
Quando Bucaneiros Brônzeos entra no campo de batalha, ele explora. (Revele o card do topo de seu grimório. Coloque aquele card em sua mão se ele for um terreno. Caso contrário, coloque um marcador +1/+1 nesta criatura e, em seguida, devolva o card ao grimório ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)

foreignNames.name: Бравые Буканьеры
foreignNames.text:
Ускорение
Когда Бравые Буканьеры выходят на поле битвы, они используют Разведку. (Покажите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Если та карта является землей, положите ее в вашу руку. В противном случае положите на это существо один жетон +1/+1, затем положите ту карту назад или положите ее на ваше кладбище.)

foreignNames.name: 莽霸联盟海贼
foreignNames.text:
敏捷
当莽霸联盟海贼进战场时，令它勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

foreignNames.name: 莽霸聯盟海賊
foreignNames.text:
敏捷
當莽霸聯盟海賊進戰場時，令它勘察。（展示你的牌庫頂牌。如果該牌是地，則置於你手上。若否，則在此生物上放置一個+1/+1指示物，然後將所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的墳墓場。）

cards.originalText:
Haste
When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Burning Sun's Avatar
cards.text: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and 3 damage to up to one target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Tilonalli's searing rays carry the spark of life's eventual destruction as all light fades."
—Chitlati, Lightning Rider

rulings.text: The ability of Burning Sun’s Avatar can target any creature, not just one controlled by the target opponent.
If the ability of Burning Sun’s Avatar has two targets and one becomes illegal, the other will still be dealt damage.

foreignNames.name: Avatar der Lodernden Sonne
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Avatar der Lodernden Sonne ins Spiel kommt, fügt er einem Gegner deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte und bis zu einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Tilonallis lodernde Strahlen kündigen den Niedergang allen Lebens an, wenn das Licht gänzlich verschwindet." —Chitlati, Blitzreiterin

foreignNames.name: Avatar del Sol Ardiente
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Avatar del Sol Ardiente entre al campo de batalla, le hace 3 puntos de daño al oponente objetivo y 3 puntos de daño a hasta una criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los rayos abrasadores de Tilonalli portan la chispa de la destrucción final de la vida cuando se apague toda luz". —Chitlati, Jinete del Rayo

foreignNames.name: Avatar du Soleil incandescent
foreignNames.text: Quand l'Avatar du Soleil incandescent arrive sur le champ de bataille, il inflige 3 blessures à un adversaire ciblé et 3 blessures à jusqu'à une créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les rayons brûlants de Tilonalli portent en eux l'étincelle de l'extinction finale de la vie lorsque la lumière s'estompera. » —Chitlati, chevaucheuse d'éclair

foreignNames.name: Avatar del Sole Ardente
foreignNames.text: Scegli fino a una creatura bersaglio. Quando l'Avatar del Sole Ardente entra nel campo di battaglia, infligge 3 danni a un avversario bersaglio e 3 danni a quella creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "I brucianti raggi di Tilonalli ardono della scintilla che infine distruggerà la vita, quando la luce si estinguerà." —Chitlati, cavalcatrice del fulmine

foreignNames.name: 焼熱の太陽の化身
foreignNames.text: 焼熱の太陽の化身が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人とクリーチャー最大１体を対象とする。これは、その前者に３点のダメージと、その後者に３点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜・アバター
foreignNames.flavor: 「ティロナーリの焼き付く陽光は、全ての光をかき消し生命を滅ぼす火花をもたらすわ。」 ――稲妻騎手、チトラーティ

foreignNames.name: 불타는 태양의 화신
foreignNames.text: 불타는 태양의 화신이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대와 최대 한 개의 생물을 목표로 정한다. 불타는 태양의 화신은 그 목표들에 각각 피해 3점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "틸로날리의 작열하는 광선은 모든 빛이 사그러지는 것 같이 생명의 궁극적인 파괴를 가져온다." —번개 기수, 치틀라티

foreignNames.name: Avatar do Sol Abrasador
foreignNames.text: Quando Avatar do Sol Abrasador entra no campo de batalha, ele causa 3 pontos de dano ao oponente alvo e 3 pontos de dano a até uma criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os raios abrasadores de Tilonalli carregam a centelha da inevitável destruição da vida quando toda luz se extinguir." — Chitlati, Ginete do Trovão

foreignNames.name: Аватара Палящего Солнца
foreignNames.text: Когда Аватара Палящего Солнца выходит на поле битвы, она наносит 3 повреждения целевому оппоненту и 3 повреждения не более чем одному целевому существу.
foreignNames.flavor: «Палящие лучи Тилоналли несут в себе искру неминуемой гибели всего живого, когда не останется света». — Читлати, наездница молний

foreignNames.name: 炙阳化身
foreignNames.text: 当炙阳化身进战场时，它向目标对手造成3点伤害，且对至多一个目标生物造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「明光尽灭时，生机火花将在蒂洛纳理炙阳灼芒之下覆亡。」 ～迅雷龙骑奇拉蒂

foreignNames.name: 炙陽化身
foreignNames.text: 當炙陽化身進戰場時，它向目標對手造成3點傷害，且對至多一個目標生物造成3點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「明光盡滅時，生機火花將在蒂洛納理炙陽灼芒之下覆亡。」 ～迅雷龍騎奇拉蒂

cards.originalText: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent and 3 damage to up to one target creature.

cards.name: Captain Lannery Storm
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You can activate the mana ability of a Treasure even if you have nothing to spend that mana on.
Captain Lannery Storm's last ability triggers whenever you sacrifice a Treasure for any reason, not just to activate a Treasure's mana ability.
If you sacrifice Treasures to cast Captain Lannery Storm, its last ability won't trigger for those Treasures.

foreignNames.name: Kapitänin Lannery Storm
foreignNames.text:
Eile
Immer wenn Kapitänin Lannery Storm angreift, erzeuge einen farblosen Schatz-Artefaktspielstein mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
Immer wenn du einen Schatz opferst, erhält Kapitänin Lannery Storm +1/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Capitana Lannery Tempestad
foreignNames.text:
Prisa.
Siempre que la capitana Lannery Tempestad ataque, crea una ficha de artefacto Tesoro incolora con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".
Siempre que sacrifiques un Tesoro, la Capitana Lannery Tempestad obtiene +1/+0 hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Capitaine Lanneray Tempeste
foreignNames.text:
Célérité
À chaque fois que la Capitaine Lanneray Tempeste attaque, créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».
À chaque fois que vous sacrifiez un trésor, la Capitaine Lanneray Tempeste gagne +1/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Capitana Lannery Fendiburrasca
foreignNames.text:
Rapidità
Ogniqualvolta la Capitana Lannery Fendiburrasca attacca, crea una pedina artefatto Tesoro incolore con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".
Ogniqualvolta sacrifichi un Tesoro, la Capitana Lannery Fendiburrasca prende +1/+0 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 風雲船長ラネリー
foreignNames.text:
速攻
風雲船長ラネリーが攻撃するたび、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ生成する。
あなたが宝物を１つ生け贄に捧げるたび、ターン終了時まで、風雲船長ラネリーは＋１/＋０の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・海賊

foreignNames.name: 래너리 스톰 선장
foreignNames.text:
신속
래너리 스톰 선장이 공격할 때마다, "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
당신이 보물을 희생할 때마다, 래너리 스톰 선장은 턴종료까지 +1/+0을 받는다.

foreignNames.name: Capitã Lannery Tormenta
foreignNames.text:
Ímpeto
Toda vez que Capitã Lannery Tormenta atacar, crie uma ficha de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
Toda vez que você sacrifica um Tesouro, Capitã Lannery Tormenta recebe +1/+0 até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Капитан Ланнери Шторм
foreignNames.text:
Ускорение
Каждый раз, когда Капитан Ланнери Шторм атакует, создайте одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».
Каждый раз, когда вы жертвуете Клад, Капитан Ланнери Шторм получает +1/+0 до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: 兰娜莉速腾船长
foreignNames.text:
敏捷
每当兰娜莉速腾船长攻击时，派出一个无色珍宝衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
每当你牺牲一个珍宝时，兰娜莉速腾船长得+1/+0直到回合结束。

foreignNames.name: 蘭娜莉速騰船長
foreignNames.text:
敏捷
每當蘭娜莉速騰船長攻擊時，派出一個無色珍寶衍生神器，且具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
每當你犧牲一個珍寶時，蘭娜莉速騰船長得+1/+0直到回合結束。

cards.originalText:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Captivating Crew
cards.text: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor: "We sail. We plunder. Then we dance."

rulings.text: You can target and gain control of an untapped creature this way.

foreignNames.name: Fesselndes Crewmitglied
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}: Übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Enttappe die Kreatur. Sie erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei wirken könntest.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir segeln, wir plündern und dann feiern wir."

foreignNames.name: Tripulación cautivadora
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}: Gana el control de la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente hasta el final del turno. Endereza esa criatura. Gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno. Activa esta habilidad solo cuando puedas lanzar un conjuro.
foreignNames.flavor: "Navegamos, saqueamos y, por último, bailamos".

foreignNames.name: Équipage captivant
foreignNames.text: {3}{R} : Acquérez le contrôle d'une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à la fin du tour. Dégagez cette créature. Elle acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour. N'activez cette capacité que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.
foreignNames.flavor: « On vogue. On pille. Et puis on danse. »

foreignNames.name: Marinaio Seducente
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}: Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quella creatura. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno. Attiva questa abilità solo quando potresti lanciare una stregoneria.
foreignNames.flavor: "Salpiamo, deprediamo e poi balliamo."

foreignNames.name: 蠱惑的な船員
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}：対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それのコントロールを得る。そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。この能力は、あなたがソーサリーを唱えられるときにのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「航海して、略奪して、踊るのさ。」

foreignNames.name: 마음을 사로잡는 선원
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}: 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 생물은 언탭되며 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다. 당신이 집중마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: "항해하고, 약탈을 하고, 그 다음에는 춤추지."

foreignNames.name: Tripulação Cativante
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}: Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo que um oponente controla até o final do turno. Desvire aquela criatura. Ela ganha ímpeto até o final do turno. Ative esta habilidade somente nos momentos em que poderia conjurar um feitiço.
foreignNames.flavor: "Navegamos. Pilhamos. E depois dançamos."

foreignNames.name: Пленительная Команда
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}: получите контроль над целевым существом под контролем оппонента до конца хода. Разверните то существо. Оно получает Ускорение до конца хода. Активируйте эту способность только при возможности разыгрывать волшебство.
foreignNames.flavor: «Мы выходим в море. Мы грабим. А потом мы пляшем».

foreignNames.name: 魅力船员
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}：获得目标由对手操控的生物之操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们扬帆。我们劫掠。我们起舞。」

foreignNames.name: 魅力船員
foreignNames.text: {3}{R}：獲得目標由對手操控的生物之操控權直到回合結束。重置該生物。它獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。只可以於你能施放巫術的時機下起動此異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我們揚帆。我們劫掠。我們起舞。」

cards.originalText: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

foreignNames.name: Anstürmender Megalosaurus

foreignNames.flavor: „Kundschafte den Weg aus, haben sie gesagt. Es ist ungefährlich, haben sie gesagt!"

foreignNames.name: Monstruosaurio a la carga
foreignNames.text: Arrolla, prisa.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ya sabía yo que tenía que haberme quedado en el barco. ¡Siempre quedarse en el barco!".

foreignNames.name: Monstrosaure chargeur
foreignNames.text: Piétinement, célérité
foreignNames.flavor: « Je savais que j'aurais dû rester au bateau. Il faut toujours rester au bateau ! »

foreignNames.name: Mostrosauro alla Carica
foreignNames.text: Travolgere, rapidità
foreignNames.flavor: "Lo sapevo, dovevo restare sulla nave. È sempre meglio restare sulla nave!"

foreignNames.text: トランプル、速攻
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「やっぱりボートに残っているべきだったよ。ずっとボートにね！」

foreignNames.name: 돌진하는 몬스트로사우루스
foreignNames.text: 돌진, 신속
foreignNames.flavor: "배에 남았어야 했어. 항상 배에 머물러야 해!"

foreignNames.name: Monstrossauro Atacante
foreignNames.text: Atropelar, ímpeto
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu sabia que devia ter ficado no barco. Sempre fique no barco!"

foreignNames.name: Нападающий Монстрозавр

foreignNames.flavor: «Так и знал, что надо было оставаться у шлюпки. Всегда надо оставаться у шлюпки!»

foreignNames.name: 猛冲暴霸龙
foreignNames.text: 践踏，敏捷
foreignNames.flavor: 「我就知道我该留在船上。每次都该选留在船上！」

foreignNames.name: 猛衝暴霸龍
foreignNames.text: 踐踏，敏捷
foreignNames.flavor: 「我就知道我該留在船上。每次都該選留在船上！」

cards.originalText: Trample, haste

cards.name: Demolish
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.
cards.flavor: What took months for human hands to carve took just seconds for the dinosaur's tail to ruin.

foreignNames.name: Demolieren
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder ein Land deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Menschen benötigen Monate, um es zu erschaffen, doch Dinosaurier benötigen nur Sekunden, um es zu zerstören.

foreignNames.name: Demoler
foreignNames.text: Destruye el artefacto o tierra objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Lo que llevó meses construir a muchas manos humanas fue reducido a polvo en segundos por la cola de un dinosaurio.

foreignNames.name: Démolition
foreignNames.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou le terrain ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: Ce que les hommes avaient mis des mois à sculpter fut détruit en quelques secondes par la queue du dinosaure.

foreignNames.name: Frantumare
foreignNames.text: Distruggi un artefatto o una terra bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Mesi di intaglio ad opera di mani umane furono rovinati in pochi secondi dalla coda del dinosauro.

foreignNames.name: 破砕
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト１つか土地１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 人の手で彫り上げるのに何か月も費やした物も、恐竜の尾で台無しになるのは数秒だ。

foreignNames.name: 철거
foreignNames.text: 마법물체나 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 인간이 몇 달에 걸쳐 세공한 작품을 공룡의 꼬리가 파괴하는 데에는 몇 초 밖에 걸리지 않았다.

foreignNames.name: Demolir
foreignNames.text: Destrua o artefato ou o terreno alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: O que as mãos humanas levaram meses para entalhar, a cauda do dinossauro levou meros segundos para destruir.

foreignNames.name: Разрушение
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт или землю.
foreignNames.flavor: Человеческим рукам понадобились месяцы на то, чтобы вырезать узоры в камне. Хвосту динозавра хватило мгновения, чтобы превратить их в обломки.

foreignNames.name: 毁坏
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标神器或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 人类需用数月时间雕刻出来的东西，恐龙只消数秒就能破坏殆尽。

foreignNames.name: 毀壞
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標神器或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 人類需用數月時間雕刻出來的東西，恐龍只消數秒就能破壞殆盡。

cards.originalText: Destroy target artifact or land.

cards.name: Dinosaur Stampede
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. Dinosaurs you control gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: If you're in the way of a ceratops charge and you're made of mere flesh and bone, then you're not really in the way.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, attacking creatures your teammate controls get +2/+0, but only Dinosaurs you control gain trample.

foreignNames.name: Ansturm der Dinosaurier
foreignNames.text: Angreifende Kreaturen erhalten +2/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Dinosaurier, die du kontrollierst, verursachen Trampelschaden bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Wenn du nicht Teil tieferer Erdschichten werden willst, bringst du dich besser in Sicherheit.

foreignNames.name: Estampida de dinosaurios
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas atacantes obtienen +2/+0 hasta el final del turno. Los Dinosaurios que controlas ganan la habilidad de arrollar hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Si te interpones en una carga de ceratops y tu cuerpo solo está hecho de carne y hueso, realmente no te estás interponiendo.

foreignNames.name: Ruée de dinosaures
foreignNames.text: Les créatures attaquantes gagnent +2/+0 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Les dinosaures que vous contrôlez acquièrent le piétinement jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Si vous êtes sur la route des cératops et que vous êtes fait de chair et d'os, vous n'êtes pas vraiment sur leur route.

foreignNames.name: Carica dei Dinosauri
foreignNames.text: Le creature attaccanti prendono +2/+0 fino alla fine del turno. I Dinosauri che controlli hanno travolgere fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Qualsiasi ostacolo di carne e ossa sul percorso di una carica di triceratopi non può definirsi propriamente un "ostacolo".

foreignNames.name: 恐竜暴走
foreignNames.text: ターン終了時まで、攻撃クリーチャーは＋２/＋０の修整を受ける。ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールしている恐竜はトランプルを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 誰かがケラトプスの突進に立ち塞がったとしよう。その人の体が普通に骨と肉でできているなら、それは立ち塞がったとは言えない。

foreignNames.name: 공룡 질주
foreignNames.text: 공격 중인 생물들은 턴종료까지 +2/+0을 받는다. 당신이 조종하는 공룡들은 턴종료까지 돌진을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Estouro de Dinossauros
foreignNames.text: As criaturas atacantes recebem +2/+0 até o final do turno. Os dinossauros que você controla ganham atropelar até o final do turno.
