foreignNames.name: Табун Динозавров
foreignNames.text: Атакующие существа получают +2/+0 до конца хода. Динозавры под вашим контролем получают Пробивной удар до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Если ты преграждаешь путь несущимся вперед цератопсам, а сам сделан из плоти и костей, то на самом деле ты им не препятствие.

foreignNames.name: 恐龙狂奔

cards.name: Firecannon Blast
cards.text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: Goblins' fearlessness and diminutive size make them the perfect cannoneers.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Feuerkanonen-Salve
foreignNames.text:
Die Feuerkanonen-Salve fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
Überfall — Die Feuerkanonen-Salve fügt jener Kreatur stattdessen 6 Schadenspunkte zu, falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast.
foreignNames.flavor: Ihre Furchtlosigkeit gepaart mit ihrer geringen Größe macht Goblins zu idealen Kanonieren.

foreignNames.name: Disparo de cañón ígneo
foreignNames.text:
El Disparo de cañón ígneo hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Salve de pyrocanon
foreignNames.text:

クリーチャー１体を対象とする。火炎砲発射はそれに３点のダメージを与える。

생물을 목표로 정한다. 불대포 발사는 그 생물에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
습격 — 이 턴에 당신이 생물로 공격했다면, 대신에 불대포 발사는 그 생물에게 피해 6점을 입힌다.

foreignNames.text:
Disparo de Canhão de Fogo causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
Raide — Se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, em vez disso, Disparo de Canhão de Fogo causa 6 pontos de dano àquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: O destemor e o tamanho diminuto fazem dos goblins os canhoneiros perfeitos.

foreignNames.name: Выстрел Огнепушки
foreignNames.text:
Выстрел Огнепушки наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу.
Набег — Если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, вместо этого Выстрел Огнепушки наносит тому существу 6 повреждений.
foreignNames.flavor: Бесстрашие и небольшие размеры гоблинов делают их идеальными канонирами.

foreignNames.name: 火炎炮轰击
foreignNames.text:
火炎炮轰击对目标生物造成3点伤害。
突击～如果你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则改为火炎炮轰击对该生物造成6点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 鬼怪无所畏惧、身材矮小，是炮手的最佳人选。

foreignNames.name: 火炎炮轟擊
foreignNames.text:
火炎炮轟擊對目標生物造成3點傷害。
突擊～如果你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則改為火炎炮轟擊對該生物造成6點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 鬼怪無所畏懼、身材矮小，是炮手的最佳人選。

cards.originalText:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage to that creature instead if you attacked with a creature this turn.

cards.name: Frenzied Raptor
cards.flavor: Sun Empire warriors are taught to emulate the fearless raptors that fling themselves against towers of horn and muscle a hundred times their size.

foreignNames.name: Tobsüchtiger Raptor
foreignNames.flavor: Den Kriegern des Imperiums der Sonne wird beigebracht, die furchtlosen Raptoren zu imitieren, die sich rücksichtslos auf turmhohe Berge aus Muskeln und Hörnern stürzen.

foreignNames.name: Ráptor enloquecido
foreignNames.flavor: Los guerreros del Imperio del Sol son entrenados para imitar a los ráptores intrépidos que se arrojan contra torres de cuernos y músculos cien veces más grandes.

foreignNames.name: Raptor hystérique
foreignNames.flavor: Les guerriers de l'Empire du Soleil apprennent à imiter les raptors intrépides qui se jettent sur des colosses de cornes et de muscles cent fois plus gros qu'eux.

foreignNames.name: Raptor Frenetico
foreignNames.flavor: I guerrieri dell'Impero del Sole sono addestrati a emulare gli intrepidi raptor, che si lanciano contro torri di corna e muscoli centinaia di volte più grandi di loro.

foreignNames.name: 激情の猛竜
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 太陽帝国の戦士は恐れ知らずの猛竜を見習えと教えられる。猛竜は、巨大な角を物ともせず自分の百倍もある相手に飛び掛かるのだ。

foreignNames.name: 광분한 랩터
foreignNames.flavor: 태양 제국 전사들은 커다란 뿔과 백 배나 더 큰 몸집을 가진 공룡에게 몸을 내던지는 랩터의 겁 없는 모습을 모방하도록 훈련받는다.

foreignNames.name: Raptor Frenético
foreignNames.flavor: Os guerreiros do Império do Sol são ensinados a emular os raptores destemidos que se lançam contra torres de chifres e músculos cem vezes maiores que eles.

foreignNames.name: Разъяренный Раптор
foreignNames.flavor: Воины Империи Солнца учатся у отчаянных рапторов, которые бесстрашно бросаются на могучих рогатых исполинов, стократно превышающих их размерами.

foreignNames.name: 狂乱迅猛龙
foreignNames.flavor: 这些无畏的迅猛龙在面对犄角和体型都数百倍于自己的庞然巨物时，依然会奋不顾身地扑击上前。烈阳帝国的战士正是以此为榜样。

foreignNames.name: 狂亂迅猛龍
foreignNames.flavor: 這些無畏的迅猛龍在面對犄角和體型都數百倍於自己的龐然巨物時，依然會奮不顧身地撲擊上前。烈陽帝國的戰士正是以此為榜樣。

cards.name: Headstrong Brute
cards.text:
Headstrong Brute can't block.
Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.
cards.flavor:
"Watch your backs, keep your blades at hand, and let the orc go first!"
—Captain Brandis Thorn

foreignNames.name: Starrköpfiger Rohling
foreignNames.text:
Der Starrköpfige Rohling kann nicht blocken.
Der Starrköpfige Rohling hat Bedrohlichkeit, solange du einen anderen Piraten kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: „Passt auf, haltet die Klingen im Anschlag und lasst den Ork vorangehen!" —Kapitän Brandis Dorn

foreignNames.name: Bruto testarudo
foreignNames.text:
El Bruto testarudo no puede bloquear.
El Bruto testarudo tiene la habilidad de amenaza mientras controles otro Pirata.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Guárdense las espaldas, tengan las armas a mano y dejen que el orco vaya primero!". —Capitán Brandis Espina

foreignNames.name: Brute entêtée
foreignNames.text:
La Brute entêtée ne peut pas bloquer.
La Brute entêtée a la menace tant que vous contrôlez un autre pirate.
foreignNames.flavor: « Surveillez vos arrières, gardez vos épées au clair... et laissez l'orque passer devant ! » —Capitaine Brandis Espine

foreignNames.name: Bruto Caparbio
foreignNames.text:
Il Bruto Caparbio non può bloccare.
Il Bruto Caparbio ha minacciare fintanto che controlli un altro Pirata.
foreignNames.flavor: "Guardatevi le spalle, sguainate le spade e fate andare avanti l'orco!" —Capitano Brandis Pugno di Spine

foreignNames.name: 身勝手な粗暴者
foreignNames.text:
身勝手な粗暴者ではブロックできない。
あなたが他の海賊をコントロールしているかぎり、身勝手な粗暴者は威迫を持つ。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — オーク・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「背後に気をつけろ。剣をしっかり持て。オークを先に行かせるんだ！」 ――棘針船長ブランディス

foreignNames.name: 고집불통 싸움꾼
foreignNames.text:
고집불통 싸움꾼은 방어할 수 없다.
당신이 다른 해적을 조종하는 한 고집불통 싸움꾼은 호전적을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: "후방을 경계하며 검을 손에서 놓지 말고, 오크를 선봉에 세워라!" —브랜디스 쏜 선장

foreignNames.name: Bruto Obstinado
foreignNames.text:
Bruto Obstinado não pode bloquear.
Bruto Obstinado terá ameaçar enquanto você controlar outro Pirata.
foreignNames.flavor: "Vigiem a retaguarda, fiquem com as lâminas à mão e deixem o orc ir primeiro!" — Capitão Brandis Espinho

foreignNames.name: Своевольный Громила
foreignNames.text:
Своевольный Громила не может блокировать.
Своевольный Громила имеет Угрозу, пока вы контролируете другого Пирата.
foreignNames.flavor: «Будьте начеку, крепче держите сабли и пропустите орка вперед!» — капитан Брандис Шип

foreignNames.name: 顽强蛮汉
foreignNames.text:
顽强蛮汉不能进行阻挡。
只要你操控另一个海盗，顽强蛮汉便具有威慑异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「留意背后，握紧武器，让半兽人先上！」 ～布兰迪竦恩船长

foreignNames.name: 頑強蠻漢
foreignNames.text:
頑強蠻漢不能進行阻擋。
只要你操控另一個海盜，頑強蠻漢便具有威懾異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「留意背後，握緊武器，讓半獸人先上！」 ～布蘭迪竦恩船長

cards.originalText:
Headstrong Brute can't block.
Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.

cards.name: Hijack
cards.text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Trapped on Ixalan, the Planeswalker Angrath is the only minotaur sailing the seas. No matter how many ships he captures, he cannot break free.

rulings.text: You can target and gain control of an untapped artifact or creature this way. You can also untap an artifact or creature you already control and give it haste.

foreignNames.name: Kapern
foreignNames.text: Übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Enttappe jene bleibende Karte. Sie erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Der auf Ixalan festsitzende Planeswalker Angrath ist der einzige Minotaurus, der die Meere durchsegelt. Doch egal wie viele Schiffe er kapert, für ihn gibt es kein Entkommen.

foreignNames.name: Decomiso
foreignNames.text: Gana el control del artefacto o la criatura objetivo hasta el final del turno. Enderézalo. Gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Atrapado en Ixalan, el Planeswalker Angrath es el único minotauro que surca los mares. Independientemente de cuántos barcos capture, no puede escapar.

foreignNames.name: Détourner
foreignNames.text: Acquérez le contrôle de l'artefact ciblé ou de la créature ciblée jusqu'à la fin du tour. Dégagez-les. Ils acquièrent la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Prisonnier d'Ixalan, le Planeswalker Angrath est le seul minotaure à écumer les mers. Peu importe le nombre de navires qu'il capture, il ne parvient pas à se libérer du plan.

foreignNames.name: Sequestrare
foreignNames.text: Prendi il controllo di un artefatto o di una creatura bersaglio fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quel permanente. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Intrappolato su Ixalan, il Planeswalker Angrath è l'unico minotauro a solcare i mari. Per quante navi conquisti, non riesce a fuggire.

foreignNames.name: 乗っ取り
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それのコントロールを得る。それをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。
foreignNames.flavor: イクサランに閉じ込められたプレインズウォーカーのアングラスは、この海でただ一人の船乗りミノタウルスである。どれほど船を捕獲しても、彼は自由になれないのだ。

foreignNames.name: 공중 납치
foreignNames.text: 마법물체나 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 턴종료까지 그 목표의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 지속물은 언탭되며 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 익살란에 갇힌 플레인즈워커 앙그라스는 바다를 항해하는 유일한 미노타우로스다. 아무리 많은 배를 나포해도 그는 이곳에서 벗어날 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Sequestrar
foreignNames.text: Ganhe o controle do artefato ou da criatura alvo até o final do turno. Desvire-o. Ele ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Preso em Ixalan, o planeswalker Angrath é o único minotauro a singrar os mares. Não importa quantos navios capture, ele não consegue se libertar.

foreignNames.name: Угон
foreignNames.text: Получите контроль над целевым артефактом или существом до конца хода. Разверните его. Он(о) получает Ускорение до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Застрявший на Иксалане Анграт — единственный в этом мире минотавр-мореход. Но сколько бы он ни захватил кораблей, он не может вырваться на свободу.

foreignNames.name: 劫持
foreignNames.text: 获得目标神器或生物的操控权直到回合结束。将之重置。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 鹏洛客安戈斯被困在依夏兰，是唯一扬帆四海的牛头人。但无论他掳获多少船只，都无法逃脱此处。

foreignNames.name: 劫持
foreignNames.text: 獲得目標神器或生物的操控權直到回合結束。將之重置。它獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 鵬洛客安戈斯被困在依夏蘭，是唯一揚帆四海的牛頭人。但無論他擄獲多少船隻，都無法逃脫此處。

cards.originalText: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Lightning Strike
cards.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"Storm on the horizon, cap'n!"
—Grick Doobin, last words

foreignNames.name: Blitzeinschlag
foreignNames.text: Der Blitzeinschlag fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ein Sturm zieht auf, Kapitän!" —Grick Doobins letzte Worte

foreignNames.name: Descarga de rayos
foreignNames.text: La Descarga de rayos hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Tormenta a la vista, capitana!". —Grick Doobin, últimas palabras

foreignNames.name: Frappe foudroyante
foreignNames.text: La Frappe foudroyante inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: « Orage à l'horizon, Capitaine ! » —Grick Doobin, derniers mots

foreignNames.name: Colpo di Fulmine
foreignNames.text: Il Colpo di Fulmine infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Tempesta all'orizzonte, capitano!" —Grick Doobin, ultime parole

foreignNames.name: 稲妻の一撃
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。稲妻の一撃はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「船長、嵐が来ます！」 ――グリック・ドービンの最後の言葉

foreignNames.name: 번개 강타
foreignNames.text: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 번개 강타는 그 목표에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "폭풍입니다, 선장님!" —그릭 두빈의 마지막 말

foreignNames.name: Golpe Relampejante
foreignNames.text: Golpe Relampejante causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Tempestade no horizonte, capitão!" — Grick Doobin, últimas palavras

foreignNames.name: Удар Грома
foreignNames.text: Удар Грома наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Буря на горизонте, капитан!» — последние слова Грика Дуббина

foreignNames.name: 闪电炼击
foreignNames.text: 闪电炼击对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「前方有风暴，船长！」 ～格理克多宾的遗言

foreignNames.name: 閃電煉擊
foreignNames.text: 閃電煉擊對目標生物或玩家造成3點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「前方有風暴，船長！」 ～格理克多賓的遺言

cards.originalText: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Lightning-Rig Crew
cards.text:
{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.
cards.flavor: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Lightning-Rig Crew’s activated ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.
An ability that triggers when a player casts a spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

foreignNames.name: Blitzkanonen-Mannschaft
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Die Blitzkanonen-Mannschaft fügt jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
Immer wenn du einen Pirat-Zauberspruch wirkst, enttappe die Blitzkanonen-Mannschaft.
foreignNames.flavor: Im Kampf gegen ein Piratenschiff kann sich das Schlachtenglück blitzartig wenden.

foreignNames.name: Tripulación de rayocañón
foreignNames.text:
{T}: La Tripulación de rayocañón hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.
Siempre que lances un hechizo de Pirata, endereza la Tripulación de rayocañón.
foreignNames.flavor: Un barco pirata en una batalla es una tormenta de actividad.

foreignNames.name: Équipage de canon à foudre
foreignNames.text:
{T} : L'Équipage de canon à foudre inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort de pirate, dégagez l'Équipage de canon à foudre.
foreignNames.flavor: Un navire pirate au combat est un véritable ouragan d'activité.

foreignNames.name: Ciurma dello Sparafulmini
foreignNames.text:
{T}: La Ciurma dello Sparafulmini infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia Pirata, STAPpa la Ciurma dello Sparafulmini.
foreignNames.flavor: Una nave pirata in battaglia è carica di tensione pronta a esplodere.

foreignNames.name: 稲妻砲手
foreignNames.text:
{T}：稲妻砲手は各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
あなたが海賊・呪文を唱えるたび、稲妻砲手をアンタップする。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 交戦中の海賊船は嵐のような有り様だ。

foreignNames.name: 번개장치 선원
foreignNames.text:
{T}: 번개장치 선원은 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
당신이 해적 주문을 발동할 때마다, 번개장치 선원을 언탭한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 전투 중인 해적선은 폭풍처럼 활발하다.

foreignNames.name: Tripulação do Aparelho de Raios
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Tripulação do Aparelho de Raios causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.
Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica de Pirata, desvire Tripulação do Aparelho de Raios.
foreignNames.flavor: Um navio pirata em batalha é uma tempestade em atividade.

foreignNames.name: Команда Молниеметателей
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Команда Молниеметателей наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту.
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание Пирата, разверните Команду Молниеметателей.
foreignNames.flavor: Пиратский корабль в бою — это настоящая буря действий.

foreignNames.name: 电擎船员
foreignNames.text:
{T}：电擎船员向每位对手各造成1点伤害。
每当你施放海盗咒语时，重置电擎船员。
foreignNames.flavor: 交战时的海盗船就是一阵忙碌的风暴。

foreignNames.name: 電擎船員
foreignNames.text:
{T}：電擎船員向每位對手各造成1點傷害。
每當你施放海盜咒語時，重置電擎船員。
foreignNames.flavor: 交戰時的海盜船就是一陣忙碌的風暴。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.

cards.name: Makeshift Munitions
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."

rulings.text: If an artifact or creature has an ability allowing you to sacrifice it for mana, you can’t sacrifice that permanent to generate mana and also to pay the sacrifice cost for the activated ability of Makeshift Munitions.

foreignNames.name: Behelfsmunition
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur: Die Behelfsmunition fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Schmiere eine Feuerkanone gründlich mit Öl aus Dinosaurierleber ein und sie feuert so ziemlich alles ab."

foreignNames.name: Municiones improvisadas
foreignNames.text: {1}, sacrificar un artefacto o una criatura: Las Municiones improvisadas hacen 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Engrasa bien un cañón ígneo con aceite de hígado de dinosaurio y destrozará cualquier cosa de un disparo".

foreignNames.name: Munitions improvisées
foreignNames.text: {1}, sacrifiez un artefact ou une créature : Les Munitions improvisées infligent 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: « Graissez bien comme il faut votre pyrocanon avec de l'huile de foie de dinosaure, et il pourra tirer tout et n'importe quoi. »

foreignNames.name: Munizioni Improvvisate
foreignNames.text: {1}, Sacrifica un artefatto o una creatura: Le Munizioni Improvvisate infliggono 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Se lubrifichi per bene una bocca di fuoco con olio di fegato di dinosauro, ci puoi sparare quasi di tutto."

foreignNames.name: 間に合わせの砲弾
foreignNames.text: {1}, アーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。間に合わせの砲弾はそれに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「火炎砲に恐竜肝油たっぷりくれてやりゃあ、何だって撃ち出せるってよ。」

foreignNames.name: 급조 포탄
foreignNames.text: {1}, 마법물체나 생물을 희생한다: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 급조 포탄은 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "공룡의 간에서 짜낸 기름으로 불대포를 잘 기름칠하면 뭐든지 쏠 수 있다구."

foreignNames.name: Munições Improvisadas
foreignNames.text: {1}, sacrifique um artefato ou uma criatura: Munições Improvisadas causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Lubrifique um canhão de fogo direitinho com óleo de fígado de dinossauro e ele vai atirar praticamente qualquer coisa."

foreignNames.name: Самодельные Снаряды
foreignNames.text: {1}, пожертвуйте артефакт или существо: Самодельные Снаряды наносят 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Как следует смажь огнепушку жиром из печени динозавра, и она сможет стрелять почти чем угодно».

foreignNames.name: 代用军火
foreignNames.text: {1}，牺牲一个神器或生物：代用军火对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「只要用恐龙肝油给火炎炮妥善润滑，基本上什么东西都打得出去。」

foreignNames.name: 代用軍火
foreignNames.text: {1}，犧牲一個神器或生物：代用軍火對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「只要用恐龍肝油給火炎炮妥善潤滑，基本上什麼東西都打得出去。」

cards.originalText: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Nest Robber
cards.text: Haste
cards.flavor:
"These sailors on our shores are like the dinosaurs that plunder eggs from nests. They live on the labors of others."
—Itzama the Crested

foreignNames.name: Nesträuber
foreignNames.text: Eile
foreignNames.flavor: „Diese Eindringlinge an unseren Küsten sind wie Dinosaurier, die Eier aus Nestern rauben. Sie leben vom Tagewerk anderer." —Itzama Knochenhaupt

foreignNames.name: Ladrón de nidos
foreignNames.text: Prisa.
foreignNames.flavor: "Estos marineros en nuestras costas son como los dinosaurios que roban huevos de otros nidos. Viven gracias a los frutos de otros". —Itzama, la Crestada

foreignNames.name: Voleur de nid
foreignNames.text: Célérité
foreignNames.flavor: « Ces marins agissent sur nos rivages comme les dinosaures qui volent des œufs dans des nids. Ils vivent au détriment des autres. » —Itzama la crêtée

foreignNames.name: Ladro dei Nidi
foreignNames.text: Rapidità
foreignNames.flavor: "Questi naviganti sulle nostre coste sono come i dinosauri che rubano le uova dai nidi: vivono delle fatiche altrui." —Itzama dalla Cresta

foreignNames.name: 巣荒らし
foreignNames.text: 速攻
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「あの岸にいる水夫どもは巣から卵を盗む恐竜と同じだ。他者を搾取して生きているのだ。」 ――冠羽のイザマ

foreignNames.name: 둥지 도둑
foreignNames.text: 신속
foreignNames.flavor: "우리의 해안에 있는 이 선원들은 둥지에서 알을 훔치는 공룡과 같다. 다른 이들의 노력에 빌붙어 살아가지." —갈기투구 이차마

foreignNames.name: Ladrão de Ninhos
foreignNames.text: Ímpeto
foreignNames.flavor: "Esses marinheiros no nosso litoral são como os dinossauros que roubam ovos dos ninhos. Eles vivem do trabalho alheio." — Itzama da Crista

foreignNames.name: Разоритель Гнезд
foreignNames.text: Ускорение
foreignNames.flavor: «Эти матросы на наших берегах — как динозавры, что крадут яйца из гнезд. Они живут за счет чужого труда». — Ицама Гребненосная

foreignNames.name: 劫巢恐龙
foreignNames.text: 敏捷
foreignNames.flavor: 「岸上这些水手跟从巢穴中偷蛋的恐龙没有什么分别。都是靠他人的劳动成果为生。」 ～冠盔伊札玛

foreignNames.name: 劫巢恐龍
foreignNames.text: 敏捷
foreignNames.flavor: 「岸上這些水手跟從巢穴中偷蛋的恐龍沒有什麼分別。都是靠他人的勞動成果為生。」 ～冠盔伊札瑪

cards.originalText: Haste

cards.name: Otepec Huntmaster
cards.text:
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Forward! Let the Burning Sun's light guide you to deserving prey!"

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a Dinosaur spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the creature remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Otepec-Jagdführer
foreignNames.text:
Dinosaurier-Zaubersprüche, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.
{T}: Ein Dinosaurier deiner Wahl erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Vorwärts! Lasst euch vom Licht der Lodernden Sonne zu eurer verdienten Beute führen!"

foreignNames.name: Maestro de caza de Otepec
foreignNames.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar los hechizos de Dinosaurio.
{T}: El Dinosaurio objetivo gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Adelante! ¡Deja que la luz del Sol Ardiente te guíe hasta la presa que mereces!".

foreignNames.name: Maître-chasseur d'Otepec
foreignNames.text:
Les sorts de dinosaure que vous lancez coûtent {1} de moins à lancer.
{T} : Le dinosaure ciblé acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « En avant ! Puisse la lumière du Soleil incandescent vous guider vers des proies méritantes ! »

foreignNames.name: Capocaccia di Otepec
foreignNames.text:
Le magie Dinosauro che lanci costano {1} in meno per essere lanciate.
{T}: Un Dinosauro bersaglio ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Avanti! Lasciate che la luce del Sole Ardente vi guidi a una degna preda!"

foreignNames.name: オテペクの猟匠
foreignNames.text:
あなたが恐竜・呪文を唱えるためのコストは{1}少なくなる。
{T}：恐竜１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン
foreignNames.flavor: 「進め！焼熱の太陽の光が然るべき獲物まで案内してくれる！」

foreignNames.name: 오테페크 사냥지휘관
foreignNames.text:
당신이 발동하는 공룡 주문들은 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.
{T}: 공룡을 목표로 정한다. 그 공룡은 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "진격하라! 불타는 태양의 빛이 사냥감이 있는 곳으로 안내할 것이다!"

foreignNames.name: Mestre de Caça de Otepec
foreignNames.text:
As mágicas de Dinossauro que você conjura custam {1} a menos para serem conjuradas.
{T}: O Dinossauro alvo ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Avante! Deixe o Sol Ardente guiar você até presas dignas."

foreignNames.name: Ловчий из Отепека
foreignNames.text:
Разыгрываемые вами заклинания Динозавров стоят на {1} меньше.
{T}: целевой Динозавр получает Ускорение до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Вперед! Пусть свет Палящего Солнца приведет вас к достойной добыче!»

foreignNames.name: 欧特佩克猎师
foreignNames.text:
你施放的恐龙咒语减少{1}来施放。
{T}：目标恐龙获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「上吧！愿炙阳光芒指引你们找到猎物！」

foreignNames.name: 歐特佩克獵師
foreignNames.text:
你施放的恐龍咒語減少{1}來施放。
{T}：目標恐龍獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「上吧！願炙陽光芒指引你們找到獵物！」

cards.originalText:
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Rampaging Ferocidon
cards.text:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
cards.flavor: All raptors are aggressive, but ferocidons seem to enjoy their prey's pain.

rulings.text: Spells and abilities that cause players to gain life still resolve while Rampaging Ferocidon is on the battlefield. No player will gain life, but any other effects of that spell or ability will happen.
If an effect says to set a player’s life total to a number that’s higher than the player’s current life total while Rampaging Ferocidon is on the battlefield, the player’s life total doesn’t change.
Rampaging Ferocidon’s last ability triggers whenever any player has a creature enter the battlefield, including you.
If another creature enters the battlefield at the same time as Rampaging Ferocidon, its last ability triggers.

foreignNames.name: Tobendes Ferocidon
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich
Spieler können keine Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.
Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur ins Spiel kommt, fügt das Tobende Ferocidon dem Beherrscher der Kreatur 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Alle Raptoren sind aggressiv, aber nur Ferocidons scheinen es zu genießen, ihrer Beute Schmerzen zuzufügen.

foreignNames.name: Ferocidón impetuoso
foreignNames.text:
Amenaza.
Los jugadores no pueden ganar vidas.
Siempre que otra criatura entre al campo de batalla, el Ferocidón impetuoso hace 1 punto de daño al controlador de esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Todos los ráptores son agresivos, pero los ferocidones parecen disfrutar del dolor de su presa.

foreignNames.name: Férocidonte déchaîné
foreignNames.text:
Menace
Les joueurs ne peuvent pas gagner de points de vie.
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille, le Férocidonte déchaîné inflige 1 blessure au contrôleur de cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor: Tous les raptors sont agressifs, mais les férocidontes semblent savourer les souffrances de leur proie.

foreignNames.name: Ferocidonte Scatenato
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare
I giocatori non possono guadagnare punti vita.
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura entra nel campo di battaglia, il Ferocidonte Scatenato infligge 1 danno al controllore di quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Tutti i raptor sono aggressivi, ma i ferocidonti sembrano addirittura compiacersi del dolore delle prede.

foreignNames.name: 暴れ回るフェロキドン
foreignNames.text:
威迫
プレイヤーはライフを得られない。
他のクリーチャーが１体戦場に出るたび、暴れ回るフェロキドンはそのクリーチャーのコントローラーに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 猛竜はどれも攻撃的だが、フェロキドンは獲物の苦痛を楽しんでいるようにも見える。

foreignNames.name: 날뛰는 페로시돈
foreignNames.text:
호전적
플레이어들은 생명점을 얻을 수 없다.
다른 생물이 전장에 들어올 때마다, 날뛰는 페로시돈은 그 생물의 조종자에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 모든 랩터가 공격적이긴 하지만, 페로시돈은 사냥감의 고통을 즐기는 것처럼 보인다.

foreignNames.name: Ferocidonte Enfurecido
foreignNames.text:
Ameaçar
Os jogadores não podem ganhar pontos de vida.
Toda vez que outra criatura entra no campo de batalha, Ferocidonte Enfurecido causa 1 ponto de dano ao controlador daquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Todo raptor é agressivo, mas os ferocidontes parecem apreciar a dor das presas.

foreignNames.name: Неистовый Свиреподон
foreignNames.text:
Угроза
Игроки не могут получать жизни.
Каждый раз, когда другое существо выходит на поле битвы, Неистовый Свиреподон наносит 1 повреждение игроку, контролирующему то существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Все рапторы агрессивны, но свиреподон словно наслаждается страданиями своей добычи.

foreignNames.name: 莽闯暴猛龙
foreignNames.text:
威慑
牌手不能获得生命。
每当另一个生物进战场时，莽闯暴猛龙对该生物的操控者造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 所有的迅猛龙都很好战，但暴猛龙似乎很享受猎物痛苦死去这段过程。

foreignNames.name: 莽闖暴猛龍
foreignNames.text:
威懾
玩家不能獲得生命。
每當另一個生物進戰場時，莽闖暴猛龍對該生物的操控者造成1點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 所有的迅猛龍都很好戰，但暴猛龍似乎很享受獵物痛苦死去這段過程。

cards.originalText:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Raptor Hatchling
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
cards.flavor:
"Every little hatchling has a parent's claws to guard it."
—Sun Empire saying

rulings.text: If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

foreignNames.name: Raptor-Junges
foreignNames.text: Erzürnen — Immer wenn dem Raptor-Jungen Schaden zugefügt wird, erzeuge einen 3/3 grünen Dinosaurier-Spielstein, der Trampelschaden verursacht.
foreignNames.flavor: „Jedes Junge hat Eltern, die es mit Zähnen und Klauen beschützen." —Sprichwort aus dem Imperium der Sonne

foreignNames.name: Cría de ráptor
foreignNames.text: Enfurecer — Siempre que la Cría de ráptor reciba daño, crea una ficha de criatura Dinosaurio verde 3/3 con la habilidad de arrollar.
foreignNames.flavor: "Todas las crías cuentan con las garras de un progenitor para defenderlas". —Refrán del Imperio del Sol

foreignNames.name: Progéniture de raptor
foreignNames.text: Rage — À chaque fois que la Progéniture de raptor subit des blessures, créez un jeton de créature 3/3 verte Dinosaure avec le piétinement.
foreignNames.flavor: « La griffe protectrice du parent n'est jamais loin de son petit. » —Adage de l'Empire du Soleil

foreignNames.name: Cucciolo di Raptor
foreignNames.text: Infuriare — Ogniqualvolta viene inflitto danno al Cucciolo di Raptor, crea una pedina creatura Dinosauro 3/3 verde con travolgere.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ogni cucciolo inerme è protetto dagli artigli del genitore." —Proverbio dell'Impero del Sole

foreignNames.name: 猛竜の幼生
foreignNames.text: 激昂 ― 猛竜の幼生にダメージが与えられるたび、トランプルを持つ緑の３/３の恐竜・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「どの幼生も親の鉤爪が守っている。」 ――太陽帝国の諺

foreignNames.name: 새끼 랩터
foreignNames.text: 격노 — 새끼 랩터가 피해를 입을 때마다, 돌진을 가진 3/3 녹색 공룡 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: "모든 어린 새끼들에게는 보호해주는 어미의 발톱이 있다." —태양 제국의 격언

foreignNames.name: Cria de Raptor
foreignNames.text: Enfurecer — Toda vez que Cria de Raptor sofrer dano, crie uma ficha de criatura verde 3/3 do tipo Dinossauro com atropelar.
foreignNames.flavor: "Todo filhotinho tem as garras dos pais para protegê-lo." — Ditado do Império do Sol

foreignNames.name: Детеныш Раптора
foreignNames.text: Неистовство — Каждый раз, когда Детенышу Раптора наносятся повреждения, создайте одну фишку существа 3/3 зеленый Динозавр с Пробивным ударом.
foreignNames.flavor: «Каждого детеныша защищают родительские когти». — поговорка Империи Солнца

foreignNames.name: 迅猛龙幼雏
foreignNames.text: 激怒～每当迅猛龙幼雏受到伤害时，派出一个3/3绿色，具践踏异能的恐龙衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「幼龙身畔，父母护之。」 ～烈阳帝国谚语

foreignNames.name: 迅猛龍幼雛
foreignNames.text: 激怒～每當迅猛龍幼雛受到傷害時，派出一個3/3綠色，具踐踏異能的恐龍衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「幼龍身畔，父母護之。」 ～烈陽帝國諺語

cards.originalText: Enrage — Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

cards.name: Repeating Barrage
cards.text:
Repeating Barrage deals 3 damage to any target.
Raid — {3}{R}{R}: Return Repeating Barrage from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Andauerndes Sperrfeuer
foreignNames.text:
Das Andauernde Sperrfeuer fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
Überfall — {3}{R}{R}: Bringe das Andauernde Sperrfeuer aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast.

foreignNames.name: Descarga redoblada
foreignNames.text:
La Descarga redoblada hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
Incursión — {3}{R}{R}: Regresa la Descarga redoblada de tu cementerio a tu mano. Activa esta habilidad solo si atacaste con una criatura este turno.

foreignNames.name: Barrage à répétition
foreignNames.text:
Le Barrage à répétition inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
Saccage — {3}{R}{R} : Renvoyez le Barrage à répétition depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. N'activez cette capacité que si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci.

foreignNames.name: Fuoco a Ripetizione
foreignNames.text:
Il Fuoco a Ripetizione infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
Incursione — {3}{R}{R}: Riprendi in mano il Fuoco a Ripetizione dal tuo cimitero. Attiva questa abilità solo se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno.

foreignNames.name: 反復連射
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。反復連射はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
強襲 ― {3}{R}{R}：あなたの墓地から反復連射をあなたの手札に戻す。この能力は、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していたときにのみ起動できる。

foreignNames.name: 계속되는 집중사격
foreignNames.text:
생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 계속되는 집중사격은 그 목표에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
습격 — {3}{R}{R}: 계속되는 집중사격을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다. 이 능력은 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했을 경우에만 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Barragem de Repetição
foreignNames.text:
Barragem de Repetição causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
Raide — {3}{R}{R}: Devolva Barragem de Repetição do cemitério para sua mão. Ative esta habilidade somente se você tiver atacado com uma criatura neste turno.

foreignNames.name: Нескончаемый Обстрел
foreignNames.text:
Нескончаемый Обстрел наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
Набег — {3}{R}{R}: верните Нескончаемый Обстрел из вашего кладбища в вашу руку. Активируйте эту способность, только если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом.

foreignNames.name: 持续齐射
foreignNames.text:
持续齐射对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。
突击～{3}{R}{R}：将持续齐射从你的坟墓场移回你手上。只能于你曾以生物攻击的回合中起动此异能。

foreignNames.name: 持續齊射
foreignNames.text:
持續齊射對目標生物或玩家造成3點傷害。

cards.name: Rigging Runner
cards.text:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: The hook makes him feel brave, and the hat makes him feel fancy.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

rulings.text: If Rile targets a creature with 1 toughness, that creature won't be destroyed until after you've drawn a card. Its abilities may affect that draw or trigger on that draw if appropriate.
If the damage that would be dealt by Rile is prevented, the creature still gains trample until end of turn.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Rile resolves, the entire spell doesn't resolve. You won't draw a card.

cards.name: Rowdy Crew
cards.text:
Trample
When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

rulings.text: Once Rowdy Crew’s triggered ability begins to resolve, no player may take other actions until it’s done. Notably, you can’t discard or cast any of the cards you draw to try to rig the results of the random discard.

The card types that can appear on the discarded cards are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Legendary is a supertype, not a card type.
The discarded cards just need to share one card type. For example, Rowdy Crew will get two +1/+1 counters if you discard an artifact creature and an enchantment creature.
Rowdy Crew doesn’t get more than two +1/+1 counters if the discarded cards happen to share more than one card type.

cards.name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
cards.text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

cards.name: Sun-Crowned Hunters
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: One alone is dangerous, and they are never alone.

rulings.text: If your life total is brought to 0 or less at the same time that Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, you lose the game before its enrage ability resolves.
If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

cards.name: Sunbird's Invocation
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's mana value. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: Casting Sunbird’s Invocation won’t cause its own ability to trigger.

The ability of Sunbird’s Invocation resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve even if that spell is countered. If you cast a spell as part of the resolution of the ability, that spell resolves before the spell that caused the ability to trigger.
For spells with {X} in their mana costs, use the value chosen for X to determine the spell’s mana value.
If the spell’s mana value is 0, you do nothing as the ability of Sunbird’s Invocation resolves.
If a revealed card in your library has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

If you cast one of the revealed cards, you do so as part of the resolution of the triggered ability. You can’t wait to cast it later in the turn. Timing permissions based on the card’s type are ignored, but other restrictions (such as “Cast [this card] only during combat”) are not.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Costly Plunder, those must be paid to cast the card.

The mana value of a split card, such as cards with aftermath from the Amonkhet block, is based on the combined mana cost of its two halves. The mana value of the resulting spell is based only on the half you cast.

foreignNames.name: Beschwörung des Sonnenvogels

Du kannst eine Karte, die auf diese Weise aufgedeckt wurde und deren umgewandelte Manakosten X oder weniger betragen, wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

rulings.text: If you don’t control a Dinosaur as Tilonalli’s Knight attacks, its ability won’t trigger at all. If you don’t control a Dinosaur as the ability of Tilonalli’s Knight resolves, that ability has no effect.

cards.name: Tilonalli's Skinshifter
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "I am the ferocity of the Burning Sun. I am hide and feather, fang and claw."

rulings.text: If the target of the ability of Tilonalli’s Skinshifter becomes an illegal target, Tilonalli’s Skinshifter won’t become a copy of anything. It will remain a 0/1 attacking creature.

Tilonalli’s Skinshifter copies the printed values of the target creature, plus any copy effects that have been applied to it. It won’t copy counters on that creature or effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
Notably, Tilonalli’s Skinshifter won’t copy effects that make a noncreature permanent become a creature. If this causes Tilonalli’s Skinshifter to stop being a creature, it’s removed from combat.
If Tilonalli’s Skinshifter copies a creature that’s copying something else, it will become whatever the target is copying.

If an effect from a resolving spell or ability, such as that of Rallying Roar, begins to apply to Tilonalli’s Skinshifter before it becomes a copy of another creature, that effect will continue to apply.
Because attackers have already been declared, any abilities Tilonalli’s Skinshifter copies that trigger when it or other creatures attack won’t trigger.
Once the ability of Tilonalli’s Skinshifter resolves, its new characteristics don’t change if the characteristics of the copied creature change or if the copied creature leaves the battlefield.
Tilonalli’s Skinshifter remains a copy of the creature through the end step. Damage is removed from it at the same time that it stops being a copy.

cards.name: Trove of Temptation
cards.text:
Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able.
At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

rulings.text: Each opponent only has to attack you or a planeswalker you control with one creature total, not one creature for you and one for each planeswalker you control. Other creatures are free to attack other players or other planeswalkers, or to not attack at all.

If a creature isn’t able to attack you or a planeswalker you control for any reason (such as being tapped as its controller’s declare attackers step begins or being affected by “summoning sickness”), that creature doesn’t have to attack. If no creatures a player controls are able to attack you or a planeswalker you control, Trove of Temptation’s requirement has no effect during that combat. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, each of your two opponents must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature if able. Attacking your teammate or a planeswalker your teammate controls doesn’t satisfy Trove of Temptation’s requirement.

foreignNames.flavor: Disputas internas da Coalizão Brônzea podem passar de insultos a salvas em um piscar de olhos.

foreignNames.name: Недружественный Огонь
foreignNames.text: Недружественный Огонь наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: В Бравом Союзе спорщики могут перейти от оскорблений к бортовым залпам в мгновение ока.

foreignNames.name: 蓄意开火
foreignNames.text: 蓄意开火对目标生物或牌手造成4点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 莽霸联盟内部的分歧转眼就能从口舌之争升级成为侧炮对轰。

foreignNames.name: 蓄意開火
foreignNames.text: 蓄意開火對目標生物或玩家造成4點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 莽霸聯盟內部的分歧轉眼就能從口舌之爭升級成為側炮對轟。

cards.originalText: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Vance's Blasting Cannons // Spitfire Bastion
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn.
Whenever you cast your third spell in a turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.
cards.flavor: With a broadside assault, Captain Vance carved the cliffs to form her new home.

rulings.text: The card exiled by the first ability of Vance’s Blasting Cannons is exiled face up.

Casting the exiled card follows the normal rules for casting that card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if you exile a creature card this way, you must wait until your main phase to cast it.
If you don’t cast the exiled card, it remains in exile.
The second ability of Vance’s Blasting Cannons resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. The ability will resolve even if that spell is countered.

The second ability of Vance’s Blasting Cannons counts all the spells you’ve cast, including Vance’s Blasting Cannons itself if you cast it this turn. The ability won’t trigger unless Vance’s Blasting Cannons is on the battlefield as you cast your third spell of the turn.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Vances Kanonenbatterie // Brandgeschoss-Bollwerk
foreignNames.text:
Schicke zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ins Exil. Falls die Karte kein Land ist, kannst du sie in diesem Zug wirken.
Immer wenn du in einem Zug deinen dritten Zauberspruch wirkst, kannst du Vances Kanonenbatterie transformieren.
foreignNames.flavor: Mit einer vollen Breitseite ebnete Kapitänin Vance schon mal das Terrain für ihr neues Domizil.

foreignNames.name: Cañonazos de Vance // Bastión escupefuego
foreignNames.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, exilia la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Si es una carta que no sea tierra, puedes lanzar esa carta este turno.
Siempre que lances tu tercer hechizo en un turno, puedes transformar los Cañonazos de Vance.
foreignNames.flavor: Con una andanada de cañones, la capitana Vance dio forma a los acantilados para que pudiera instalarse en ellos.

foreignNames.name: Salve de canon de Vance // Bastion Crachefeu
foreignNames.text:
Au début de votre entretien, exilez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si c'est une carte non-terrain, vous pouvez lancer cette carte ce tour-ci.
À chaque fois que vous lancez votre troisième sort du tour, vous pouvez transformer la Salve de canon de Vance.
foreignNames.flavor: En une bordée de coups de canon, la capitaine Vance creusa la falaise pour y établir son repaire.

foreignNames.name: Cannoni Esplosivi di Vance // Baluardo Focoso
foreignNames.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, esilia la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Se è una carta non terra, puoi lanciarla in questo turno.
Ogniqualvolta lanci la tua terza magia in un turno, puoi trasformare i Cannoni Esplosivi di Vance.
foreignNames.flavor: La Capitana Vance scolpì la scogliera a suon di bordate per ricavarne la sua nuova dimora.

foreignNames.name: ヴァンスの爆破砲 // 火を吐く稜堡
foreignNames.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを追放する。それが土地でないカードであったなら、このターン、あなたはそのカードを唱えてもよい。
あなたがいずれかのターン内で３つ目のあなたの呪文を唱えるたび、あなたはヴァンスの爆破砲を変身させてもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 船長ヴァンスは一斉砲撃を行って、その断崖を自分たちの根拠地に作り替えた。

foreignNames.name: 반스의 불뿜는 대포 // 불을 토하는 성채
foreignNames.text:
당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 추방한다. 그 카드가 대지가 아니라면, 당신은 이 턴에 그 카드를 발동할 수 있다.
당신이 한 턴에 당신의 세 번째 주문을 발동할 때마다, 당신은 반스의 불뿜는 대포를 변신시킬 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 반스 선장은 한 번의 함포 공격으로 절벽을 깎아 새로운 보금자리를 만들었다.

foreignNames.name: Bastião Cospe-fogo // Bastião Cospe‑fogo
foreignNames.text:
No início de sua manutenção, exile o card do topo de seu grimório. Se não for um terreno, você pode conjurar aquele card neste turno.
Toda vez que conjura sua terceira mágica em um turno, você pode transformar Canhões Explosivos de Vance.
foreignNames.flavor: Com uma salva lateral, a Capitã Vance esculpiu os penhascos para formar seu novo lar.

foreignNames.name: Палящие Пушки Вэнс // ОГНЕДЫШАЩИЙ БАСТИОН
foreignNames.text:
В начале вашего шага поддержки изгоните верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Если это не являющаяся землей карта, вы можете разыграть ее в этом ходу.
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете ваше третье заклинание в ходу, вы можете трансформировать Палящие Пушки Вэнс.
foreignNames.flavor: Пушечными залпами капитан Вэнс высекла в утесах свой новый дом.

foreignNames.name: 凡丝轰击炮阵 // 喷火堡垒
foreignNames.text:
在你的维持开始时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是非地牌，则本回合中，你可以施放该牌。
每当你施放同一回合中的第三个咒语时，你可以转化凡丝轰击炮阵。
foreignNames.flavor: 一轮侧炮齐轰后，凡丝船长在崖壁上开辟出了新的据点。

foreignNames.name: 凡絲轟擊炮陣 // 噴火堡壘
foreignNames.text:
在你的維持開始時，放逐你的牌庫頂牌。如果該牌是非地牌，則本回合中，你可以施放該牌。
每當你施放同一回合中的第三個咒語時，你可以轉化凡絲轟擊炮陣。
foreignNames.flavor: 一輪側炮齊轟後，凡絲船長在崖壁上開闢出了新的據點。

cards.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn.
Whenever you cast your third spell in a turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.

cards.name: Vance's Blasting Cannons // Spitfire Bastion
cards.text:
(Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.)
{T}: Add {R}.
{2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Now instead of a ship, Ripley Vance commands a fortress.

rulings.text: The card exiled by the first ability of Vance’s Blasting Cannons is exiled face up.

Casting the exiled card follows the normal rules for casting that card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if you exile a creature card this way, you must wait until your main phase to cast it.
If you don’t cast the exiled card, it remains in exile.
The second ability of Vance’s Blasting Cannons resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. The ability will resolve even if that spell is countered.

The second ability of Vance’s Blasting Cannons counts all the spells you’ve cast, including Vance’s Blasting Cannons itself if you cast it this turn. The ability won’t trigger unless Vance’s Blasting Cannons is on the battlefield as you cast your third spell of the turn.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Vances Kanonenbatterie // Brandgeschoss-Bollwerk
foreignNames.text:
(Transformierte Vances Kanonenbatterie.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R}.
{2}{R}, {T}: Das Brandgeschoss-Bollwerk fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Anstelle eines Schiffs befehligt Ripley Vance nun eine Festung.

foreignNames.name: Cañonazos de Vance // Bastión escupefuego
foreignNames.text:
(Se transforma de los Cañonazos de Vance.)
{T}: Agrega {R} a tu reserva de maná.
{2}{R}, {T}: El Bastión escupefuego hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Ahora, en vez de un barco, Ripley Vance dirige una fortaleza.

foreignNames.name: Salve de canon de Vance // Bastion Crachefeu
foreignNames.text:
(Transformation de la Salve de canon de Vance.)
{T} : Ajoutez {R} à votre réserve.
{2}{R}, {T} : Le Bastion Crachefeu inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: Désormais, Ripley Vance ne commande plus un navire mais une forteresse.

foreignNames.name: Cannoni Esplosivi di Vance // Baluardo Focoso
foreignNames.text:
(Si trasforma dai Cannoni Esplosivi di Vance.)
{T}: Aggiungi {R} alla tua riserva di mana.
{2}{R}, {T}: Il Baluardo Focoso infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Ora, invece di una nave, Ripley Vance comanda una fortezza.

foreignNames.name: ヴァンスの爆破砲 // 火を吐く稜堡
foreignNames.text:
（ヴァンスの爆破砲から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}を加える。
{2}{R}, {T}：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。火を吐く稜堡はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: リプリー・ヴァンスは今では、船ではなく砦を指揮している。

foreignNames.name: 반스의 불뿜는 대포 // 불을 토하는 성채
foreignNames.text:
(반스의 불뿜는 대포에서 변신함)
{T}: {R}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{2}{R}, {T}: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 불을 토하는 성채는 그 목표에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 이제 리플리 반스는 해적선이 아니라 요새를 지휘한다.

foreignNames.name: Bastião Cospe-fogo // Bastião Cospe‑fogo
foreignNames.text:
(Transformação de Canhões Explosivos de Vance.)
{T}: Adicione {R} à sua reserva de mana.
{2}{R}, {T}: Bastião Cospe-fogo causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Agora, em vez de um navio, Ripley Vance comanda uma fortaleza.

foreignNames.name: Палящие Пушки Вэнс // ОГНЕДЫШАЩИЙ БАСТИОН
foreignNames.text:
(Трансформируется из Палящих Пушек Вэнс.)
{T}: добавьте {R} в ваше хранилище маны.
{2}{R}, {T}: Огнедышащий Бастион наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: Теперь вместо корабля Рипли Вэнс командует крепостью.

foreignNames.name: 凡丝轰击炮阵 // 喷火堡垒
foreignNames.text:
（由凡丝轰击炮阵转化。）
{T}：加{R}到你的法术力池中。
{2}{R}，{T}：喷火堡垒对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 而今蕾普莉凡丝不再号令船只，而是掌控整座堡垒。

foreignNames.name: 凡絲轟擊炮陣 // 噴火堡壘
foreignNames.text:
（由凡絲轟擊炮陣轉化。）
{T}：加{R}到你的魔法力池中。
{2}{R}，{T}：噴火堡壘對目標生物或玩家造成3點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 而今蕾普莉凡絲不再號令船隻，而是掌控整座堡壘。

cards.originalText:
(Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.)
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Wily Goblin
cards.text: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor: Goblins climb and swing with ease, whether through a pirate ship's rigging or a tree's branches.

foreignNames.name: Hinterlistiger Goblin
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Hinterlistige Goblin ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen farblosen Schatz-Artefaktspielstein mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
foreignNames.flavor: Dem Goblin ist es gleich, ob er sich nun durch Segelwerk oder Baumkronen schwingt.

foreignNames.name: Trasgo astuto
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Trasgo astuto entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de artefacto Tesoro incolora con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: Los trasgos se cuelgan y descuelgan con facilidad, ya sea de los mástiles de un barco pirata o de las ramas de un árbol.

foreignNames.name: Gobelin rusé
foreignNames.text: Quand le Gobelin rusé arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».
foreignNames.flavor: Les gobelins montent et se balancent aussi aisément au gréement d'un navire pirate qu'à des branches d'arbre.

foreignNames.name: Goblin Astuto
foreignNames.text: Quando il Goblin Astuto entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina artefatto Tesoro incolore con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: I goblin si arrampicano e si lanciano con la stessa facilità dal sartiame di una nave o dai rami di un albero.

foreignNames.name: ずる賢いゴブリン
foreignNames.text: ずる賢いゴブリンが戦場に出たとき、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: ゴブリンというのは高所に登り動き回るのが得意である。船の帆綱でも木の枝でも変わらない。

foreignNames.name: 교활한 고블린
foreignNames.text: 교활한 고블린이 전장에 들어올 때, "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 고블린들은 해적선의 삭구가 됐든 나뭇가지가 됐든 쉽게 올라가고 이동한다.

foreignNames.name: Goblin Astuto
foreignNames.text: Quando Goblin Astuto entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: Escalar e pular são tarefas fáceis para os goblins, seja pelos mastros de um navio pirata, seja pelos galhos de uma árvore.

foreignNames.name: Коварный Гоблин
foreignNames.text: Когда Коварный Гоблин выходит на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Гоблины — мастера лазать и качаться, будь то такелаж пиратского корабля или ветви деревьев.

foreignNames.name: 狡诈鬼怪
foreignNames.text: 当狡诈鬼怪进战场时，派出一个无色珍宝衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 鬼怪长于攀缘摆荡，无论是船上支索还是树上枝桠都能如履平地。

foreignNames.name: 狡詐鬼怪
foreignNames.text: 當狡詐鬼怪進戰場時，派出一個無色珍寶衍生神器，且具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 鬼怪長於攀緣擺盪，無論是船上支索還是樹上枝椏都能如履平地。

cards.originalText: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Ancient Brontodon
cards.flavor: It is taller than all but the tallest trees, and older than all but the oldest.

foreignNames.name: Uraltes Brontodon
foreignNames.flavor: Nur die allerhöchsten Bäume überragen es und nur die ältesten der alten Bäume sind länger auf der Welt.

foreignNames.name: Brontodón anciano
foreignNames.flavor: Es más alto que nadie, salvo los árboles más altos, y más anciano que nadie... salvo el árbol más anciano.

foreignNames.name: Brontodonte ancien
foreignNames.flavor: Il est presque aussi grand que les arbres les plus hauts, et presque aussi vieux que les plus anciens.

foreignNames.name: Antico Brontodonte
foreignNames.flavor: È alto quasi quanto gli alberi più imponenti e antico quasi quanto i più primordiali.

foreignNames.name: 古代ブロントドン
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: それは最も高い木ほども高く、最も古い木ほども古い。

foreignNames.name: 고대 브론토돈
foreignNames.flavor: 가장 큰 나무만큼이나 크고 가장 오래된 나무만큼이나 나이가 많다.

foreignNames.name: Brontodonte Ancestral
foreignNames.flavor: Ele é quase tão alto quanto as árvores mais altas, e quase tão velho quanto as árvores mais velhas.

foreignNames.name: Древний Бронтодон
foreignNames.flavor: Лишь самые высокие деревья превосходят его ростом, и лишь самые древние — возрастом.

foreignNames.name: 远古霆伟龙
foreignNames.flavor: 它仅矮于参天大树，仅幼于传世古木。

foreignNames.name: 遠古霆偉龍
foreignNames.flavor: 牠僅矮於參天大樹，僅幼於傳世古木。

cards.name: Atzocan Archer
cards.text:
Reach
When Atzocan Archer enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor: His arrows are fletched with feathers from the greatest of the winged dinosaurs.

rulings.text: You must choose another target creature (if able) as Atzocan Archer’s triggered ability is put on the stack. You choose as that ability resolves whether those creatures fight.
If Atzocan Archer isn’t on the battlefield as its triggered ability resolves, or if the target of that ability is illegal, no creature will deal or be dealt damage.
Atzocan Archer’s ability can target another creature you control (such as a Dinosaur with an enrage ability).

foreignNames.name: Atzocan-Bogenschütze
foreignNames.text:
Reichweite
Wenn der Atzocan-Bogenschütze ins Spiel kommt, kannst du ihn gegen eine andere Kreatur deiner Wahl kämpfen lassen. (Jede dieser Kreaturen fügt der anderen Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.)
foreignNames.flavor: Er befiedert seine Pfeile mit den Federn der imposantesten Flugsaurier.

foreignNames.name: Arquero de Atzocan
foreignNames.text:
Alcance.
Cuando el Arquero de Atzocan entre al campo de batalla, puedes hacer que luche con otra criatura objetivo. (Cada una hace una cantidad de daño igual a su fuerza a la otra.)
foreignNames.flavor: Las plumas de sus flechas provienen de los mayores dinosaurios alados.

foreignNames.name: Archer d'Atzocan
foreignNames.text:
Portée
Quand l'Archer d'Atzocan arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez faire qu'il se batte contre une autre créature ciblée. (Chacune inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à l'autre.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ses flèches sont empennées des plumes du plus grand des dinosaures ailés.

foreignNames.name: Arciere di Yatzocal
foreignNames.text:
Raggiungere
Quando l'Arciere di Yatzocal entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi farlo lottare con un'altra creatura bersaglio. (Ogni creatura infligge all'altra danno pari alla propria forza.)
foreignNames.flavor: La cocca delle sue frecce è ricavata dalle piume dei più colossali dinosauri alati.

foreignNames.name: アゾカンの射手
foreignNames.text:
到達
アゾカンの射手が戦場に出たとき、他のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたは「これはそれと格闘を行う。」を選んでもよい。（それぞれはもう一方に自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・射手
foreignNames.flavor: 彼の矢羽根には、最大の翼竜の羽根が使われている。

foreignNames.name: 앗초칸 궁수
foreignNames.text:
대공
앗초칸 궁수가 전장에 들어올 때, 다른 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 앗초칸 궁수와 그 생물이 싸우게 할 수 있다. (각 생물은 서로에게 각자의 공격력만큼 피해를 입힌다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 그의 화살에는 최고의 익룡 깃털로 만든 깃이 달려 있다.

foreignNames.name: Arqueiro de Atzocan
foreignNames.text:
Alcance
Quando Arqueiro de Atzocan entra no campo de batalha, você pode fazer com que ele lute contra outra criatura alvo. (Cada uma causa à outra uma quantidade de dano igual ao seu poder.)
foreignNames.flavor: Suas flechas são feitas com penas dos maiores dinossauros alados.

foreignNames.name: Лучник из Ацокана
foreignNames.text:
Захват
Когда Лучник из Ацокана выходит на поле битвы, вы можете заставить его драться с другим целевым существом. (Они наносят друг другу повреждения, равные своей силе.)
foreignNames.flavor: На оперение его стрел идут перья самых могучих крылатых динозавров.

foreignNames.name: 阿佐坎弓箭手
foreignNames.text:
延势
当阿佐坎弓箭手进战场时，你可以让它与另一个目标生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）
foreignNames.flavor: 他的箭矢以最庞巨的有翼恐龙羽毛作翎。

foreignNames.name: 阿佐坎弓箭手
foreignNames.text:
延勢
當阿佐坎弓箭手進戰場時，你可以讓它與另一個目標生物互鬥。（它們各向對方造成等同於本身力量的傷害。）
foreignNames.flavor: 他的箭矢以最龐巨的有翼恐龍羽毛作翎。

cards.originalText:
Reach
When Atzocan Archer enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: Blinding Fog
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor: "I see you, shiny soldiers, but you won't see me."

rulings.text: Blinding Fog prevents all damage that would be dealt to creatures, not just combat damage.
Damage that would be dealt to creatures that enter the battlefield later in the turn will also be prevented. However, creatures that come under your control later in the turn won’t gain hexproof.

foreignNames.name: Trübender Nebel
foreignNames.text: Verhindere allen Schaden, der Kreaturen in diesem Zug zugefügt würde. Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Fluchsicherheit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Sie können nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich kann euch sehen, aber ihr mich nicht, törichte Soldaten."

foreignNames.name: Niebla cegadora
foreignNames.text: Prevén todo el daño que se fuera a hacer a las criaturas este turno. Las criaturas que controlas ganan la habilidad de antimaleficio hasta el final del turno. (No pueden ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades que controlan tus oponentes.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Yo los veo, soldados brillantes, pero ustedes no me verán a mí".

foreignNames.name: Brouillard aveuglant
foreignNames.text: Prévenez toutes les blessures qui devraient être infligées à des créatures ce tour-ci. Les créatures que vous contrôlez acquièrent la défense talismanique jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elles ne peuvent pas être les cibles de sorts ou de capacités que vos adversaires contrôlent.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Je vous vois, soldats rutilants, mais vous ne me verrez pas. »

foreignNames.name: Nebbia Accecante
foreignNames.text: Previeni tutto il danno che verrebbe inflitto alle creature in questo turno. Le creature che controlli hanno anti-malocchio fino alla fine del turno. (Non possono essere bersaglio di magie o abilità controllate dai tuoi avversari.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Vi vedo, soldatini splendenti, ma voi non vedrete me."

foreignNames.name: 目隠し霧
foreignNames.text: このターン、クリーチャーに与えられるダメージをすべて軽減する。ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは呪禁を得る。（それらは対戦相手がコントロールしている呪文や能力の対象にならない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「よく見えるよ、兵隊さん。でもそっちからは見えないよね。」

foreignNames.name: 눈을 멀게 하는 안개
foreignNames.text: 이번 턴에 생물이 입으려고 하는 모든 피해를 방지한다. 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 턴종료까지 방호를 얻는다. (그 지속물들은 상대가 조종하는 주문이나 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)
foreignNames.flavor: "난 너희들이 보여, 반짝거리는 병사들아. 하지만 너희는 날 볼 수 없지."

foreignNames.name: Neblina Cegante
foreignNames.text: Previna todo o dano que seria causado a criaturas neste turno. As criaturas que você controla ganham resistência a magia até o final do turno. (Elas não podem ser alvo de mágicas nem de habilidades controladas por seus oponentes.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu vejo vocês, soldadinhos brilhantes, mas vocês não me verão."

foreignNames.name: Слепящий Туман
foreignNames.text: Предотвратите все повреждения, которые должны быть нанесены существам в этом ходу. Существа под вашим контролем получают Порчеустойчивость до конца хода. (Они не могут быть целями заклинаний или способностей под контролем ваших оппонентов.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Я вижу вас, блестящие солдаты, а вот вы меня не увидите».

foreignNames.name: 蔽目浓雾
foreignNames.text: 于本回合中，防止将对生物造成的所有伤害。由你操控的生物获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。（它们不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「我看见你们了，金光闪闪的士兵们，但你们看不见我。」

foreignNames.name: 蔽目濃霧
foreignNames.text: 於本回合中，防止將對生物造成的所有傷害。由你操控的生物獲得辟邪異能直到回合結束。（它們不能成為由對手所操控之咒語或異能的目標。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「我看見你們了，金光閃閃的士兵們，但你們看不見我。」

foreignNames.text: Arrolla.

foreignNames.name: Bocarra Sinistra Colossal

cards.name: Commune with Dinosaurs
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Saurierzähmung
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Dinosaurier-Karte oder eine Länderkarte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: En comunión con dinosaurios
foreignNames.text: Mira las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de Dinosaurio o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignNames.name: Communion avec les dinosaures
foreignNames.text: Regardez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de dinosaure ou de terrain parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignNames.name: Sintonia con i Dinosauri
foreignNames.text: Guarda le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta Dinosauro o terra scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignNames.name: 恐竜との融和
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを５枚見る。あなたはその中から、恐竜か土地であるカード１枚を公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: 공룡과의 대화
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 본다. 당신은 그 중에서 공룡이나 대지 카드 한 장을 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드들은 당신이 원하는 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Comungar com os Dinossauros
foreignNames.text: Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de Dinossauro ou terreno dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Общение с Динозаврами
foreignNames.text: Посмотрите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать находящуюся среди них карту Динозавра или земли и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.

cards.originalText: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Crash the Ramparts
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Legion's conquistadors could endure Ixalan's sun. Their forts could withstand a charging ceratops. But nothing can stop a ceratops strengthened by the sun.

foreignNames.name: Zertrümmert die Palisaden
foreignNames.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl +3/+3 und verursacht Trampelschaden.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Konquistadoren der Legion können der Sonne standhalten. Ihre Befestigungen können den Hörnern eines Ceratops standhalten. Doch nichts kann einem durch die Sonne gestärkten Ceratops standhalten.

foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene +3/+3 y gana la habilidad de arrollar hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Los conquistadores de la Legión lograron soportar el sol de Ixalan; sus fuertes lograron resistir a la carga de un ceratops; pero nada puede detener a un ceratops con la fuerza del sol.

foreignNames.name: Sfondare le Fortificazioni

foreignNames.name: 塁壁壊し

foreignNames.flavor: 軍団の征服者はイクサランの太陽に耐えられるかもしれない。軍団の砦はケラトプスの突進に耐えられるかもしれない。だが、太陽の力を得たケラトプスを止められるものなど存在しない。

foreignNames.name: 성곽 박살내기
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +3/+3을 받고 돌진을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 군단의 정복자들은 익살란의 태양을 견딜 수 있었다. 군단의 요새는 돌진하는 케라톱스를 막을 수 있었다. 하지만 태양에 의해 강화된 케라톱스는 그 무엇으로도 막을 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Romper a Paliçada
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo recebe +3/+3 e ganha atropelar até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Os conquistadores da Legião conseguiam suportar o sol de Ixalan. Seus fortes conseguiam resistir ao ataque de um cerátopo. Mas nada consegue deter um cerátopo fortalecido pelo sol.

foreignNames.name: Проломить Заслоны
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает +3/+3 и Пробивной удар до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Конкистадоры Легиона могут выстоять под лучами солнца Иксалана. Стены их фортов могут сдержать напор атакующих цератопсов. Но ничто не может остановить цератопса, усиленного могуществом солнца.

foreignNames.name: 冲破壁垒
foreignNames.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+3/+3且获得践踏异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 暮影军团的征服者能忍受依夏兰的烈日，他们的要塞能抵挡犄角龙的冲击。但什么都挡不住受烈阳祝福的犄角龙。

foreignNames.name: 衝破壁壘
foreignNames.text: 直到回合結束，目標生物得+3/+3且獲得踐踏異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 暮影軍團的征服者能忍受依夏蘭的烈日，他們的要塞能抵擋犄角龍的衝擊。但什麼都擋不住受烈陽祝福的犄角龍。

cards.originalText: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

foreignNames.flavor: "높은 곳에 있다고 해서 안전하다고 착각하지 말아라." —변형술사 투바사

cards.name: Deathgorge Scavenger
cards.text: Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: There’s no way to get both bonuses at once while Deathgorge Scavenger’s ability is resolving. If an artifact creature card is exiled this way, it’s a creature card and not a noncreature card.

foreignNames.name: Todesschlucht-Aasfresser
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Todesschlucht-Aasfresser ins Spiel kommt oder angreift, kannst du eine Karte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil schicken. Falls auf diese Weise eine Kreaturenkarte ins Exil geschickt wird, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu. Falls auf diese Weise eine Nicht-Kreaturenkarte ins Exil geschickt wird, erhält der Todesschlucht-Aasfresser +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Carroñero engullemuertos
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Carroñero engullemuertos entre al campo de batalla o ataque, puedes exiliar la carta objetivo de un cementerio. Si una carta de criatura es exiliada de este modo, ganas 2 vidas. Si una carta que no sea de criatura es exiliada de este modo, el Carroñero engullemuertos obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Charognard avaleur de cadavres
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Charognard avaleur de cadavres arrive sur le champ de bataille ou attaque, vous pouvez exiler une carte ciblée depuis un cimetière. Si une carte de créature est exilée de cette manière, vous gagnez 2 points de vie. Si une carte non-créature est exilée de cette manière, le Charognard avaleur de cadavres gagne +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Saprofago Sbranamorte
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Saprofago Sbranamorte entra nel campo di battaglia o attacca, puoi esiliare una carta bersaglio da un cimitero. Se una carta creatura viene esiliata in questo modo, guadagni 2 punti vita. Se una carta non creatura viene esiliata in questo modo, il Saprofago Sbranamorte prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 貪る死肉あさり
foreignNames.text: 貪る死肉あさりが戦場に出るか攻撃するたび、墓地からカード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれを追放してもよい。これによりクリーチャー・カードが追放されたなら、あなたは２点のライフを得る。これによりクリーチャーでないカードが追放されたなら、ターン終了時まで、貪る死肉あさりは＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜

foreignNames.name: 사체포식 청소부
foreignNames.text: 사체포식 청소부가 전장에 들어오거나 공격할 때마다, 무덤에 있는 카드를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 카드를 추방할 수 있다. 생물 카드가 이런 식으로 추방되면, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다. 생물이 아닌 카드가 이런 식으로 추방되면, 사체포식 청소부는 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받는다.

foreignNames.name: Carniceiro Gorja da Morte
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Carniceiro Gorja da Morte entra no campo de batalha ou ataca, você pode exilar o card alvo de um cemitério. Se um card de criatura for exilado dessa forma, você ganha 2 pontos de vida. Se um card que não seja de criatura for exilado dessa forma, Carniceiro Gorja da Morte recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Трупожор-Падальщик
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Трупожор-Падальщик выходит на поле битвы или атакует, вы можете изгнать целевую карту из кладбища. Если таким образом изгоняется карта существа, вы получаете 2 жизни. Если таким образом изгоняется не являющаяся существом карта, Трупожор-Падальщик получает +1/+1 до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: 噬尸食腐龙
foreignNames.text: 每当噬尸食腐龙进战场或攻击时，你可以将目标牌从坟墓场放逐。如果以此法放逐的是生物牌，则你获得2点生命。如果以此法放逐的是非生物牌，则噬尸食腐龙得+1/+1直到回合结束。

foreignNames.name: 噬屍食腐龍
foreignNames.text: 每當噬屍食腐龍進戰場或攻擊時，你可以將目標牌從墳墓場放逐。如果以此法放逐的是生物牌，則你獲得2點生命。如果以此法放逐的是非生物牌，則噬屍食腐龍得+1/+1直到回合結束。

cards.originalText: Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Deeproot Champion
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.
cards.flavor: "No good will come from what you seek. Turn back now or suffer an ignoble death far from your home."

rulings.text: Deeproot Champion’s ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger.

foreignNames.name: Urwurzel-Champion

foreignNames.flavor: „Dein Begehr bringt nichts als Unheil. Kehre um oder stirb einsam und verlassen auf fremdem Boden."

foreignNames.name: Campeón de Raizprofunda

foreignNames.flavor: "No encontrarás nada bueno en lo que buscas. Vuelve ahora sobre tus pasos o sufrirás una muerte innoble lejos de casa".

foreignNames.name: Champion de Plongeracine
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort non-créature, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur le Champion de Plongeracine.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ce que vous cherchez n'amènera rien de bon. Rebroussez chemin ou souffrez une mort atroce loin de chez vous. »

foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・シャーマン
foreignNames.flavor: 「探し求めてもろくなことにはならない。今すぐ引き返せ。故郷から離れた地で、不名誉な死を迎えることになるぞ。」

foreignNames.name: 깊은뿌리 투사
foreignNames.text: 당신이 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동할 때마다, 깊은뿌리 투사에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "그대들이 찾는 것에선 어떤 좋은 일도 생기지 않는다. 당장 돌아가지 않으면 타지에서 처참한 죽음을 맞이할 것이다."

foreignNames.name: Campeão de Raiz Profunda

foreignNames.flavor: "Nada de bom virá do que você procura. Volte agora ou sofra uma morte ignóbil longe de casa."

foreignNames.name: Воитель Глубокого Корня
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете не являющееся существом заклинание, положите один жетон +1/+1 на Воителя Глубокого Корня.
foreignNames.flavor: «Из твоих поисков не выйдет ничего хорошего. Поверни назад, или тебя ждет жалкая смерть вдали от дома».

foreignNames.name: 繁根林斗士

foreignNames.name: 繁根林鬥士

cards.originalText: Whenever Deeproot Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Drover of the Mighty
cards.text:
Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: "I do not lead. They do not follow. We walk together."

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, the damage Drover of the Mighty takes during combat may become lethal if you no longer control a Dinosaur later in the turn.

foreignNames.name: Hirte der Kolosse
foreignNames.text:
Der Hirte der Kolosse erhält +2/+2, solange du einen Dinosaurier kontrollierst.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich treibe sie nicht an und sie folgen mir nicht. Wir gehen Seite an Seite."

foreignNames.name: Pastor de los colosos
foreignNames.text:
El Pastor de los colosos obtiene +2/+2 mientras controles un Dinosaurio.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná.
foreignNames.flavor: "Yo no soy su líder ni ellos me siguen. Vamos juntos".

foreignNames.name: Bouvier des puissants
foreignNames.text:
Le Bouvier des puissants gagne +2/+2 tant que vous contrôlez un dinosaure.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je ne guide pas. Ils ne suivent pas. Nous marchons ensemble. »

foreignNames.name: Domatore dei Possenti
foreignNames.text:
Il Domatore dei Possenti prende +2/+2 fintanto che controlli un Dinosauro.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana.
foreignNames.flavor: "Io non li conduco, né loro mi seguono: camminiamo insieme."

foreignNames.name: 大物群れの操り手
foreignNames.text:
あなたが恐竜をコントロールしているかぎり、大物群れの操り手は＋２/＋２の修整を受ける。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ドルイド
foreignNames.flavor: 「私が指示するのではない。これが従うのでもない。我らは共に歩むのだ。」

foreignNames.name: 거대 생물 몰이꾼
foreignNames.text:
당신이 공룡을 조종하는 한 거대 생물 몰이꾼은 +2/+2를 받는다.
{T}: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내가 이끌거나 이들이 날 따르는 것이 아니다. 우리는 함께 걷는다."

foreignNames.name: Tropeiro do Poderoso

Tropeiro do Poderoso receberá +2/+2 enquanto você controlar um Dinossauro.

foreignNames.flavor: "Eu não lidero. Eles não me seguem. Nós andamos juntos."

foreignNames.name: Погонщик Гигантов

Погонщик Гигантов получает +2/+2, пока вы контролируете Динозавра.

foreignNames.flavor: «Я не веду их. И они не следуют за мной. Мы идем вместе».

foreignNames.name: 巨兽牧者
